en.MrHandyDialog_Generic_48: I wonder how many humans have died in this place. Just curious. Really.
en.MrHandyDialog_Generic_49: Some of you humans are happy, some of you are sad... Consistency, people!
en.MrHandyDialog_Gym_01: That's it, humans. Pump it up!
en.MrHandyDialog_Gym_02: That's it, humans. Pump it up!
en.MrHandyDialog_Hydroponics_01: Oh, I do so wish they would allow me to tend the garden. I come with all the right attachments.
en.MrHandyDialog_Hydroponics_02: Oh, I do so wish they would allow me to tend the garden. I come with all the right attachments.
en.MrHandyDialog_LivingQuarters_01: So this is where the magic happens...
en.MrHandyDialog_LivingQuarters_02: *Sigh* These humans get to have all the fun.
en.MrHandyDialog_Medbay_01: Imagine. Needing a “Stimpak” for self-maintenance. Oh, humans. You slay me.
en.MrHandyDialog_Medbay_02: Imagine. Needing a “Stimpak” for self-maintenance. Oh, humans. You slay me.
en.MrHandyDialog_NukaCola_01: Because, really, why WOULDN'T you fill your body with processed sugar water?
en.MrHandyDialog_NukaCola_02: Because, really, why WOULDN'T you fill your body with processed sugar water?
en.MrHandyDialog_PowerGenerator_02: Anybody need me to store some extra juice? I won't steal any. Really. I swear.
en.MrHandyDialog_RadioStation_01: Mic check, mic check, 1. 2. 3. Is this thing on?
en.MrHandyDialog_RadioStation_02: Mic check, mic check, 1. 2. 3. Is this thing on?
en.MrHandyDialog_Reactor_01: Oh, yes, let's develop atomic energy. Because that worked out sssooo well before...
en.MrHandyDialog_Reactor_02: Oh, yes, let's develop atomic energy. Because that worked out sssooo well before...
en.MrHandyDialog_ScienceLab_01: Having to manage radiation. In a post-apocalyptic Wasteland. Clearly, someone needs to evolve...
en.MrHandyDialog_ScienceLab_02: Having to manage radiation. In a post-apocalyptic Wasteland. Clearly, someone needs to evolve...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_10: Surely someone out here must need a shoe shine...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_12: Those voices do NOT sound friendly. Time to skedaddle.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_13: Oh look, a broken crib. Isn't that encouraging.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_14: Is that? Why yes, it's an old General Atomics factory. Looks like they broke the mold when they made me. Literally.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_15: If I were human, I'd be dead by now. Perish the thought.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_16: My radiation sensors are going haywire. Not that I care.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_17: You know, it's not much to look at, but an enterprising robot could make quite the life for himself out here...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_18: A deflated basketball, lying in the road. Symbolic of something, I'm sure...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_19: Oh look. A destroyed donut shop. No more cake rings and muddy coffee for the humans, I'm afraid.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_2: Ah, the Wasteland. As predictably depressing as one would expect.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_20: My thermometer is reading the current temperature as something approaching “Seventh Circle of Hell”.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_21: Looks like it may rain. Lovely.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_22: Rock in the road. I'll just hover right over that, like so...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_23: For an emotionless metal automaton, I suddenly find myself... terrified!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_24: Hello! Yes you, sir! I was wondering if... Oh. You're a corpse. Well then. Carry on.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_25: Sensors indicate... Yes. That's a Super Mutant. And yes, I am now headed in the opposite direction...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_26: You can say one thing about humans – they sure know how to destroy themselves.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_27: And to think, humans worried that robots would turn against them. They turned against themselves just fine...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_28: If I go home empty handed I'll never hear the end of it...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_29: Scavenging the Wasteland like some sort of peasant. I'm better than this.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_3: Of course. Send the domestic servant into a deadly post-apocalyptic Wasteland. What could possibly go wrong?
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_30: If my makers at General Atomics International could see me now...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_31: Hellllloooo! Any other robots out heeeerrrreee?
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_32: Ah, a broken bridge. Think I'll take the long way around.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_33: My goodness, look at those hedges. Doesn't anyone appreciate the value of landscaping anymore?
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_34: I think I'm getting... custodial withdrawal. I may have to enter one of these old homes and sweep up for a bit.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_35: Don't mind me. I'm just folding this pile of burned laundry...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_36: I want to go home. I want to go home. I want to go home.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_37: Should I head back to the Vault? Or is it too soon? Somebody please tell me what to do!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_38: A domestic robot dedicated to cleaning. Wandering a post-apocalyptic landscape. My OCD is going HAYWIRE.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_39: Definitely starting to rethink this whole, “Send the Mister Handy to the Wasteland!” idea...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_4: Send the robot, they said. He'll be fine, they said. Barbarians.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_40: Overseer? Are you out there? Please, I implore you! Don't... don't let me die.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_41: Oh for Heaven's sake, I'm a domestic robot, not a bloody tank. What am I even doing out here?!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_42: I'll find what I find, then head back. No heroics! Not for this Mister Handy!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_43: Agh! A Deathclaw! Retreat! I'm a lover not a fighter!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_45: This direction looks as good as any.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_46: Hmmm. Left or right? I think... right.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_47: Hmmm. Left or right? I think... left.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_48: No. NO! Shoo, dog! Shoo! I am NOT a fire hydrant! I am a Mister Handy model... Agghh! No! BAD doggie!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_49: Oh look. A Feral Ghoul eating a man's arm. That's certainly not something you see every day.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_50: I'd be sweating profusely by now, I'd imagine. Had I the glands.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_51: Oh, wonderful. I'm talking to myself. Just what I need – psychosis.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_52: I think I've had enough “fresh air” for one lifetime, thank you very much.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_53: Maybe I'll hum to myself. That'll lift the ol' spirits.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_54: Exploring is so interesting. And terrifying. Not to mention utterly boring.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_56: I'll just cut through this neighborhood, see where it goes...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_57: I wonder where this road leads.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_58: A spooky pass through blasted woods? How could I possibly resist.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_59: I really don't see what all the fuss is about. It's not so bad out OH MY HEAVENS, A SEVERED HEAD.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_6: My internal compass indicates I'm now facing north. Guess I'll float along in that direction...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_60: Looks like an old ice cream parlor. Human children did so enjoy their juvenile diabetes.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_61: I'll just hover right over this puddle of blood...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_62: Mole rat holes. Maybe I'd best go the other way.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_63: Hmm. Large humans in the distance. Maybe... Ah yes, Super Mutants. Time to turn around.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_64: Was that a... “pling”? Did someone actually take a shot at me? How rude!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_65: If I had feet, they would be SO sore right now.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_66: Oh look, an old basketball court. Definitely not my game. I possess neither a shirt, nor skin.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_67: Ah, an old baseball diamond. A game much like cricket, only far inferior.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_68: A child's wooden blocks. From before the war. I wonder where... Oh.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_69: Well bless my stars! A Giddyup Buttercup. Such an elegant steed.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_7: My internal compass indicates I'm now facing south. Guess I'll float along in that direction...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_70: A locked door. And me without my bobby pin.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_71: Hmm. A computer terminal. Meant for human fingers, sadly.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_72: If I were to just hover off into the sunset, would the Vault even care?
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_73: Hmph. A broken down Protectron. Typical RobCo workmanship.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_74: Ah, look at that. An old Chryslus Corvega. Because nuclear cars were SUCH a good idea...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_75: A radio playing, somewhere in the distance. Almost makes me feel like dancing.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_76: Heavens, it's like one giant, uncleanable mess out here. I think I'm having a panic attack.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_77: I'll stay out for just a while longer...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_78: This way looks... Well, it looks terrible. But so does every other way.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_8: My internal compass indicates I'm now facing west. Guess I'll float along in that direction...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_83: Looks like an old office building. Ah, the skeleton of commerce.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_84: An old coffee shop. If it were a tea house, I might feel a tinge of sorrow.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_85: Yet another destroyed school. Get smart, build a bomb, destroy yourselves. That's humans for you.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_86: This exploring is exhausting work. If I had pores, I'd be sweating like a corpulent human in a sauna.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_87: If I were a human, I'd be exceptionally thirsty right now. Guess that explains their Nuka-Cola obsession.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_88: Oh ho! A fork in the road. Let's go... right!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_89: Well, well... a fork in the road! Let's go... left!
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_9: My internal compass indicates I'm now facing east. Guess I'll float along in that direction...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_90: Maybe I should crest that hill, take stock of my surroundings.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_91: Now THAT is a big building. Humans were so skilled at building magnificent things to destroy.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_92: A stuffed rabbit nailed to a door. Not really sure WHAT to make of that...
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_93: Oh, how interesting. A crudely-written sign. “Enter and die!” No ambiguity there.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_94: Oh look, two humans beating each other to death with tire irons. Go, humanity.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_95: What is this? Ah yes. I'm hovering over a minefield. I'll never be envious of legs again.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_96: I've heard rumors that a rogue A.I. actually caused the Great War. To think – WANTING a mess like this.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_97: Ooooohhh... An old suit of Power Armor. Now THAT'S a chassis.
en.MrHandyDialog_Wasteland_98: Every step, used chems and empty liquor bottles. That explains so much.
en.MrHandyDialog_WaterPlant_01: I'm starting to rethink my aversion to plastic parts...
en.MrHandyDialog_WaterPlant_02: I may not sleep, or dream, but this room gives me nightmares.
en.MrHandyDialog_WaterPurification_01: Really, if you're going to consume water, you may as well make it digestible.
en.MrHandyDialog_WaterPurification_02: Really, if you're going to consume water, you may as well make it digestible.
en.MrHandy_Card_TagLine: Always a Pleasure to Serve You!
en.MrHandy_ContentLine1: Automatically collects resources from Vault and CAPS from the Wasteland.
en.NewGameSaveConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to create a new save?
en.Not_Connected: You are not connected. Play as a Guest?

en.Notification_Baby_Grow_Up: One of your babies has grown into a healthy Dweller!

en.Notification_Crafting_Weapon_End: One of your Weapon Workshops has made a Weapon!
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_01: One of your Dwellers has been out in the Wasteland for a short while. Perhaps you should check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_02: One of your Dwellers has been out in the Wasteland for a while, you should check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_03: One of your Dwellers has been out in the Wasteland for a long time, you should check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_04: One of your Dwellers has been out in the Wasteland for a quite a while, you should definitely check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_05: One of your Dwellers has been out in the Wasteland for a while, you should check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_06: One of your Dwellers has been out on the Wasteland for a while, you should check on them.
en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_07: One of your Dwellers has been out on the Wasteland for a while, you should check on them.

en.Notification_DwellerWasteland_10: One of your Dwellers has been out on the Wasteland for a while, you should check on them.

en.Objective_WastelandWithPet_Plural: Send [0] Dwellers to the Wasteland with a Pet
en.Outfit_Description_AbrahamSpecial: For singing that famous battle hymn, the National Anthem.
en.Outfit_Description_AlistairSpecial: A favorite of Wasteland elitists and real estate developers.
en.Outfit_Description_AllNighware: Best used when sleeping or... entertaining.
en.Outfit_Description_AllNighware_Lucky: Go to bed grinning and wake up smiling. Every. Single. Time.
en.Outfit_Description_AllNighware_Naughty: When the lights go out, your special skills shine.
en.Outfit_Description_ArgyleSweater: Because the Vault's Caps reserve doesn't count itself.
en.Outfit_Description_BOSUniform: The official garb of the Brotherhood of Steel.
en.Outfit_Description_BOSUniform_Advanced: Get away with pulling rank when you're dressed like a BoS officer.
en.Outfit_Description_BOSUniform_Expert: Reserved for the best of the best... of the BoS.
en.Outfit_Description_BaseballUniform: Uniform of America's spectator sport. No matter which version you prefer.
en.Outfit_Description_BattleArmor: The protection of choice for Wasteland mercenaries.
en.Outfit_Description_BattleArmor_Heavy: Favored by runaway synths... and the synths who hunt them.
en.Outfit_Description_BattleArmor_Sturdy: Offers the look and protection of a mercenary captain.
en.Outfit_Description_Bishop: If there is a higher power out there, they just might listen to you.
en.Outfit_Description_BittercupSpecial: Perfect for any child at heart forced to endure the Wastes.
en.Outfit_Description_BowlingShirt: Now all you need is a Rocket '69 and a pompadour.
en.Outfit_Description_BusinessDress: They'll never see you coming and never know you were there.
en.Outfit_Description_BusinessSuit: The clothes make the man, and that man has something to sell you.
en.Outfit_Description_ButchSpecial: Why? Because you're a Tunnel Snake. And you RULE!
en.Outfit_Description_CheckeredShirt: It may be spring, but keep that shirt tucked in. This isn't a zoo.
en.Outfit_Description_ColonelSpecial: Once worn by a hard-nosed colonel. Now you give the orders.
en.Outfit_Description_CombatArmor: The preferred battlefield armor of pre-war grunts.
en.Outfit_Description_CombatArmor_Heavy: They used to send in an army. Now they only need you.
en.Outfit_Description_CombatArmor_Sturdy: Worn by the toughest ground pounders in the toughest battles.
en.Outfit_Description_ComedianSpecial: Is this outfit some kind of joke? Nope, but you are, if you wear it.
en.Outfit_Description_CromwellSpecial: By the power of Atom, you look fabulous!
en.Outfit_Description_DooWopOutfit: The outfit of choice when heading to the Diner for a shake.
en.Outfit_Description_EmpressSpecial: Friends, Romans, countrymen... lend me your snazzy new outfit.
en.Outfit_Description_EngineerSpecial: Protects against sledgehammers, and not just on the job site.
en.Outfit_Description_EulogyJonesSpecial: For those times when you need to exude charismatic evil.
en.Outfit_Description_FarHarborSpecial: It's almost as Old as Longfellow himself.
en.Outfit_Description_FlightSuit: The preferred outfit of flying aces everywhere.
en.Outfit_Description_FlightSuit_Advanced: Negative, Vault Dweller. The pattern is full.
en.Outfit_Description_FlightSuit_Expert: You can be my wingman any time!
en.Outfit_Description_GamblerSuit: A gambler's outfit of choice. Feeling lucky?
en.Outfit_Description_GamblerSuit_Fancy: The look of a gambler, the skills of a hustler. That's a good bet.
en.Outfit_Description_GamblerSuit_Lucky: Perfect for cheating your way through a poker tournament.
en.Outfit_Description_HandymanJumpsuit: Great for fixing a leaking valve, or refueling a Chryslus Corvega.
en.Outfit_Description_HandymanJumpsuit_Adva: Fix a crashed Vertibird? You can build one from scratch.
en.Outfit_Description_HandymanJumpsuit_Expe: Perfect for surviving the Wasteland. Or writing a book about it.
en.Outfit_Description_HazmatSuit: The best protection against hazardous materials.
en.Outfit_Description_HazmatSuit_Heavy: Life may be unforgiving, but you've become unstoppable.
en.Outfit_Description_HazmatSuit_Sturdy: If the Wastes can spit it out, you can take it.
en.Outfit_Description_HunterGear_Bounty: No target too elusive... no fee too big.
en.Outfit_Description_HunterGear_Mutant: Ideal for tracking and wasting muties.
en.Outfit_Description_HunterGear_Treasure: That booty can't stay hidden forever...
en.Outfit_Description_InstituteJumper: Because even synths like to relax at home.
en.Outfit_Description_InstituteJumper_Exper: Look like a synth - skip the identity crisis.
en.Outfit_Description_JacketTshirt: With no motorcycle, you'll surely be mistaken for a hoodlum.
en.Outfit_Description_King: Wear the crown, rule the Wasteland! Or at least pretend to.
en.Outfit_Description_KnightSpecial: In the Wasteland, some forms of protection never go out of style.
en.Outfit_Description_LabCoat_Advanced: Split the atom or invent warp travel - all before lunch.
en.Outfit_Description_LabCoat_Expert: Now you can unlock the secrets of life itself!
en.Outfit_Description_LibrarianSpecial: Prove to everyone that in the future, print's not dead.
en.Outfit_Description_LoungeShirt: No one will know you've never actually bowled before.
en.Outfit_Description_LucasSpecial: From Modoc to Megaton, when you wear this, you are the law.
en.Outfit_Description_MayorSpecial: Settlements need rulers, and you're elected.
en.Outfit_Description_MechanicJumpsuit: The Wasteland is littered with old wrecks. Time to get to work.
en.Outfit_Description_MetalArmor: When leather just won't do. Can stop one bullet, or a hundred.
en.Outfit_Description_MetalArmor_Heavy: You... are... an iron person! Cue cool song, commence killing.
en.Outfit_Description_MetalArmor_Sturdy: A little more welding, a lot more steel, and... voila!
en.Outfit_Description_MilitaryJumpsuit: Standard issue for soldiers before the Great War.
en.Outfit_Description_MilitaryJumpsuit_Comm: The battlefield is under your control. Orders?
en.Outfit_Description_MilitaryJumpsuit_Offi: Great for giving orders, or wading into the fight yourself.
en.Outfit_Description_MoviefanSpecial: Perfect for hanging out at an old, abandoned drive-in.
en.Outfit_Description_NinjaSuit: You are silence. You are shadow. You are... ninja!
en.Outfit_Description_PiperSpecial: Report the news? You ARE the news.
en.Outfit_Description_PolkaDotDress: Greet the Wasteland with a smile in this playful number.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor: Before Power Armor even really existed, this baby was born.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_51a: An enhanced prototype that saw limited use pre-war.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_51d: One of the most advanced armors created before the Great War.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_51f: Armor worthy of a Brotherhood of Steel Star Paladin. And you.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_MkI: The guys who protected the President wore this. It's THAT good.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_MkIV: Advanced post-war Power Armor, for a post-apocalyptic world.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_MkVI: The most advanced protection created by human hands. Enjoy.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_T45d: Deployed pre-war against Chinese tanks. That's right - tanks.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_T45f: Lovingly maintained. Favored by neo knights and paladins.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_T60a: The pinnacle of powered pre-war protection.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_T60d: Renowned protection, favored by the Brotherhood of Steel.
en.Outfit_Description_PowerArmor_T60f: Specially enhanced and vastly superior to most other armors.
en.Outfit_Description_PrestonSpecial: For those with honor, willing to help out at a minute's notice.
en.Outfit_Description_PrinceSpecial: Snack cakes aren't the only fancy lads in town.
en.Outfit_Description_ProfessorSpecial: Sometimes, just sometimes, brain really is better than brawn.
en.Outfit_Description_RadiationSuit: Designed to protect its wearer from radiation.
en.Outfit_Description_RadiationSuit_Advance: Ever want to give a Glowing One a hug? Now's your chance.
en.Outfit_Description_RadiationSuit_Expert: Ever feel like swimming in a pool of radioactive waste?
en.Outfit_Description_RaiderArmor: The standard gear of Wasteland ruffians.
en.Outfit_Description_RaiderArmor_Heavy: For the psycho in charge of all the other psychos.
en.Outfit_Description_RaiderArmor_Sturdy: Only the Wastes' toughest Raiders get to wear these duds.
en.Outfit_Description_RiotGear: Functional and flattering, for all your Wasteland needs.
en.Outfit_Description_RiotGear_Heavy: The best mercs make the most Caps... and wear the best clothes.
en.Outfit_Description_RiotGear_Sturdy: Handle anything the Wastes throw at you... in style.
en.Outfit_Description_RothchildSpecial: Reserved for Brotherhood of Steel geniuses. Guess that's you.
en.Outfit_Description_ScientistScrubs: Wear this, and when you talk, someone may actually listen.
en.Outfit_Description_ScientistScrubs_Comma: When you give an order, people jump. High.
en.Outfit_Description_ScientistScrubs_Offic: For those times you absolutely need a commanding presence.
en.Outfit_Description_ScifiSpecial: You may not live long or prosper, but you'll at least die dreaming.
en.Outfit_Description_ScribeRobe: Worn by the Brotherhood of Steel's best and brightest.
en.Outfit_Description_ScribeRobe_Elder: Robes of honor, worn only by Brotherhood of Steel Elders.
en.Outfit_Description_ScribeRobe_Initiate: Typically worn by Brotherhood of Steel scribes.
en.Outfit_Description_SequinDress: For when you want all eyes in the room to be on you.
en.Outfit_Description_SlasherSpecial: Show your support for slasher films by dressing like a lunatic!
en.Outfit_Description_SodaFountainDress: The perfect mix of style, sophistication and... soda?
en.Outfit_Description_SoldierSpecial: Good enough for America's troops, good enough for you.
en.Outfit_Description_SpecialThemeHalloween: Give the tricks, get the treats, and try not to go into sugar shock.
Skeleton – The most popular Halloween costume of 2077 - an American circa 2078
en.Outfit_Description_SpecialThemeThanksGiv: Show your thanks for surviving the nuclear Armageddon. And turkey. Delicious, irradiated turkey...
en.Outfit_Description_SpecialThemeXmas: Tis the season to prove Santa still visits your Vault - even if it doesn't have a chimney.
en.Outfit_Description_SpecialThemeXmas2: Overworked? Underappreciated? Funny uniform? Vault Dweller or Christmas Elf – the choice is yours.
en.Outfit_Description_SportsfanSpecial: Offers great protection from tackles... or Deathclaw hugs.
en.Outfit_Description_SurgeonSpecial: Great for patching up a wounded friend. Or yourself, for that matter.
en.Outfit_Description_SurvivorSpecial: Handle anything the Wasteland throws at you. Again and again.
en.Outfit_Description_Suspenders: Country chic or fringe hip? Let them wonder.
en.Outfit_Description_SweaterVest: Can't decide between a sweater and a vest? Why not both?
en.Outfit_Description_Swimsuit: An itsy bitsy teeny weeny ye... Never mind.
en.Outfit_Description_SwingDress: Burn up the dance floor like a true jiving jitterbug.
en.Outfit_Description_SynthArmor_Heavy: Worn by synths trained for heavy combat.
en.Outfit_Description_Threedog: Fight the good fight... or die tryin'.
en.Outfit_Description_TiedBlouse: Ideal for backbreaking farm work and country music performances.
en.Outfit_Description_UtilityJumpsuit: A standard Vault Suit modified for the rigors of the Wastes.
en.Outfit_Description_UtilityJumpsuit_Heavy: Usually reserved for Vault Overseers and their families.
en.Outfit_Description_UtilityJumpsuit_Sturd: The height of Vault-Tec fashion, reinforced for the Wastes.
en.Outfit_Description_Vest: Break some hearts with the smartest look in the Vault.
en.Outfit_Description_WaitressUniform: Comes with a side of lip, a sprinkling of sass, and a bottomless cup.
en.Outfit_Description_WandererArmor: The armor of legend, worn by the Wasteland's greatest hero...
en.Outfit_Description_WandererArmor_Heavy: Hunter or hunted, hero or villain - if you're a badass, suit up.
en.Outfit_Description_WandererArmor_Sturdy: The Wasteland classic, fortified for the rigors of heroism.
en.Outfit_Description_Wasteland_Doctor: Perfect for shrapnel removal or bandaging boo-boos.
en.Outfit_Description_Wasteland_Medic: Has plenty of pockets for bandages and painkillers.
en.Outfit_Description_Wasteland_Surgeon: Amputation, appendectomy, gastric bypass - do it all, in the field!
en.Outfit_Description_WorkDress: Even Vault children need to learn reading, writing and arithmetic.
en.Outfit_Description_WrestlerSpecial: Protection and style, in and out of the squared circle.
en.PetCarrier_ContentLine2: Pets can be assigned to dwellers to give them a unique bonus!
en.PetCarrier_campaign_Header: To ensure your experience is as enjoyable and hassle-free as possible, Vault-Tec engineers have implemented some exciting new features!
en.PetCarrier_campaign_Main1: PETS HAVE COME TO FALLOUT SHELTER<lf>Here's a free Pet Carrier to get you started!<lf>Open it to welcome a furry* friend to your Vault.
en.PetCarrier_campaign_Main2: DWELLER EVICTION<lf>Thank freeloading Dwellers for their service. By kicking them out!
en.PetCarrier_campaign_Main3: SELL, SELL, SELL!<lf>Sell whole Storage stacks, or all of an Explorer's Common items, at once.
en.Pet_Carrier_PopUp_Main: HERE'S A PET CARRIER TO GET YOUR PET COLLECTION STARTED! OPEN IT TO WELCOME A FURRY* FRIEND TO YOUR VAULT.
en.Pet_Description_abyssinian_b: The epitome of the sleek, slim, feline form.
en.Pet_Description_akita_b: Loves children. Other dogs, not so much.
en.Pet_Description_akita_l: Likes to think he's in charge. You'll need to teach him otherwise.
en.Pet_Description_american_b: Cats? Extinct? Just try getting rid of these babies.
en.Pet_Description_american_l: A shining example of American breeding.
en.Pet_Description_australianshepherd_b: There isn't a ball he can't catch.
en.Pet_Description_australianshepherd_l: Gets restless without exercise. “Restless” meaning he'll eat your shoes.
en.Pet_Description_blacklab_b: Splashing on a beach or curled up at your feet... the quintessential pet pooch.
en.Pet_Description_blacklab_l: Raised by children, loved by all. Used to living underground.
en.Pet_Description_bloodhound_b: The best tracker in the Commonwealth.
en.Pet_Description_bloodhound_l2: Someone missing? He's on the case!
en.Pet_Description_bloodhound_l3: The scourge of mole rats and radstags everywhere.
en.Pet_Description_blueyellowmacaw_b: Genetically engineered by Vault-Tec to fulfill your pirate fantasies.
en.Pet_Description_blueyellowmacaw_l: When it comes to birds made in a lab, he's the best of the nest!
en.Pet_Description_blueyellowmacaw_l2: This big house bird doesn't eat crackers – he IS Crackers.
en.Pet_Description_blueyellowmacaw_l3: When it comes to speech, he's up for the challenge.
en.Pet_Description_bombay_b: That bad luck myth is ssoooo blown out of proportion.
en.Pet_Description_bombay_l: Who stole your sweet roll? One guess.
en.Pet_Description_boxer_b: Playful, good with kids, capable of ripping a Raider's arm off. Yeah.
en.Pet_Description_boxer_l: He can survive in the Wasteland, but is only truly alive by your side.
en.Pet_Description_british_b: All knowing, all seeing. Just ask Alice.
en.Pet_Description_british_l: An indoor cat with Wasteland proclivities. Keep that Vault door shut.
en.Pet_Description_brittany_b: Fast and rugged, he ain't nothin' but a bird dog.
en.Pet_Description_brittany_l: Quiet yet commanding, with a legendary ability to inspire.
en.Pet_Description_burmilla_b: This pretty kitty cheers up even the gloomiest Vault Dweller.
en.Pet_Description_burmilla_l2: He scratches you because he loves you. Honest.
en.Pet_Description_cattledog_b: Children. Brahmin. Deathclaws. She can herd them all.
en.Pet_Description_cattledog_l: Loves to pal around with Abe Lincoln. Or what's left of him.
en.Pet_Description_collie_b: Trapped in a well? She'll get help!
en.Pet_Description_collie_l: A coat so soft, you'll want to pet her forever.
en.Pet_Description_dalmatian_b: Rumors of huge litters are greatly exaggerated.
en.Pet_Description_dalmatian_l: He may not be able to put out a fire, but he can offer moral support.
en.Pet_Description_dalmatian_l2: If your Vault catches on fire - and it will - he's your charm.
en.Pet_Description_doberman_b: Aggressive? Sure. Loyal and loving? You'd better believe it.
en.Pet_Description_doberman_l: Daring and dangerous, but oh so adorable.
en.Pet_Description_englishmastiff_b: Don't let his size fool you - he's a softie at heart.
en.Pet_Description_englishmastiff_l: We're gonna need a bigger dog bed...
en.Pet_Description_germanpointer_b: The classic hunting dog. Now adjusting nicely to subterranean life.
en.Pet_Description_germanpointer_l: His hunting days are over, but this dog never ducks his duties.
en.Pet_Description_germanshepherd_b: The word “classic” barely does him justice.
en.Pet_Description_germanshepherd_l: From the Den to Diamond City, the true legend of the Wastes.
en.Pet_Description_goldenret_l: Has been known to play fetch... with five balls at once.
en.Pet_Description_greyhound_l: Don't bet against him in a race.
en.Pet_Description_havanabrown_b: Get used to saying How did you get up there?
en.Pet_Description_havanabrown_l: Curls up on your lap and casts a sleeping spell on you.
en.Pet_Description_husky_b: She's equally adept at pulling a sled... and your heartstrings.
en.Pet_Description_husky_l: He served our troops in Anchorage. Now he proudly serves the Vault.
en.Pet_Description_laperm_l: Thinks mice were created for his own personal amusement.
en.Pet_Description_laperm_l2: Looks like he's fresh out of the dryer.
en.Pet_Description_laperm_l3: A fancy coat, and the attitude to match.
en.Pet_Description_lykoi_b: Those ears can hear you serving cat food from a mile away.
en.Pet_Description_lykoi_l: Strikes silently... at least where your toes are concerned.
en.Pet_Description_mainecoon_b: Only looks like a wild child. He's as calm and cuddly as they come.
en.Pet_Description_mainecoon_l: He misses the great outdoors. But not much.
en.Pet_Description_manx_b: Your best friend, as long as you have tuna.
en.Pet_Description_manx_l: To nap, or not to nap: that is the question.
en.Pet_Description_manx_l2: Runs in circles endlessly. Chasing what? Exactly.
en.Pet_Description_manx_l3: Don't mention his tail, don't mention his tail...
en.Pet_Description_militarymacaw_b: Can sing America the Beautiful... or swear at the Overseer.
en.Pet_Description_militarymacaw_l: Loyal but hungry. Wants a cracker, but Sugar Bombs will do in a pinch.
en.Pet_Description_militarymacaw_l2: Knows 200 words, but will only say “Tunnel Snakes Rule!”
en.Pet_Description_ocicat_b: The closest you'll get to an ocelot. Revolver not included.
en.Pet_Description_ocicat_l: He's got more spots than sense, but you'll love him all the same.
en.Pet_Description_pallascat_b: Rumor has it there's a cat somewhere under all that fur.
en.Pet_Description_pallascat_l: Frequently mistaken for a feather duster.
en.Pet_Description_persian_b: Long hair, round face, maximum cuddle factor.
en.Pet_Description_persian_l: The first cat to enter space. The last to leave your heart.
en.Pet_Description_pitbullterrier_b: Your stop for effective canine security.
en.Pet_Description_pitbullterrier_l: Don't let the bad rap fool you - he's as loyal as can be.
en.Pet_Description_pitbullterrier_l2: Underneath all those muscles, there's a big heart.
en.Pet_Description_pitbullterrier_l3: Your Vault couldn't ask for a better guard dog.
en.Pet_Description_poodle_b: Don't misjudge this fancy pants – he's smart, sweet and strong.
en.Pet_Description_poodle_l: Wanted a mohawk. Got... this. He's a hero on the inside.
en.Pet_Description_rottweiler_b: Big and bad, but devoted and obedient. He's a friend for life.
en.Pet_Description_rottweiler_l: Benign soul in a brawny bod. She's love and loyalty exemplified.
en.Pet_Description_scarletmacaw_b: Avast, matey! He'll keep you company while you're swabbing the poop deck.
en.Pet_Description_scarletmacaw_l: He'll happily sit on your shoulder. Angel, devil... or both.
en.Pet_Description_scottishfold_b: Look, sometimes my ears fold back. Let's not make it a thing.
en.Pet_Description_scottishfold_l: A happy-go-lucky little gal, but a tad sensitive about her ears.
en.Pet_Description_siamese_b: Not stuck up... just better than you.
en.Pet_Description_siamese_l: The prettiest, most patient princess on the planet.
en.Pet_Description_somali_b: Wants to be outside when in, and come inside when out.
en.Pet_Description_sphynx_b: Because who wouldn't want a hairless cat?! Right?!
en.Pet_Description_sphynx_l: Thinks she's a goddess. May not be wrong.
en.Pet_Description_stbernard_b: If you're ever lost in the Alpine, expect him to come running.
en.Pet_Description_toyger_b: A lot safer than the full-sized version.
en.Pet_Description_toyger_l: Not nearly as fierce as he looks.
en.Pet_Description_turkishvan_l2: Struggling with a catnip addiction, but still adorable.
en.Piper_campaign_Text: A new special visitor from Fallout 4 wants to join your Vault
en.PreTutorial_Start: Great! You created a new Vault. Your main objective is to keep your Dwellers alive and happy. Good luck!
en.PreTutorial_VaultName: Now you have to determine the ID of your Vault. Choose carefully, because once you select an ID, it can't be changed!
en.QUEST_1_ANWSER_2: You wish. No mercy for Raiders!
en.QUEST_1_ANWSER_3: No, we want your gear instead. Or else.
en.QUEST_1_ANWSER_4: Why should we trust Raider scum?
en.QUEST_1_FOLLOWUP_1: Just head all the way to the top.
en.QUEST_1_FOLLOWUP_3: Ok, ok, no need to do anything rash. Here.
en.QUEST_1_FOLLOWUP_4: I can’t let an insult like that slide. Kill 'em!
en.QuestLoc_12PointBuck_QuestLongDescriptio: “I once shot a Deathclaw in my pajamas. How he got in my pajamas I'll never know”
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_Conversation_1_NPCE: In that case, sign me up!
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_Conversation_1_NPCS: Thank goodness you're here! I'm all alone and my supplies have run out.
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_Conversation_1_Team: Your troubles are over. The Vault's got everything you need.
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_QuestLongDescriptio: One of your Wasteland explorers has heard a cry for help that's coming from a Red Rocket fuel station. Time to rush to the rescue!
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_QuestObjective_1: Investigate the Red Rocket Truck Stop.
en.QuestLoc_ACryforHelp_QuestShortDescripti: Someone in a Red Rocket Truck Stop is calling for help.
en.QuestLoc_AGatheringofGhouls_QuestLongDes: A ghastly Glowing One has taken up residence a little too close to the Vault, and it's drawing in Ghouls like moths to a flame. Extinguish the brilliant beacon before this Ghoulish gathering grows any larger!
en.QuestLoc_AGatheringofGhouls_QuestShortDe: Confront a Glowing One and its Ghoul minions.
en.QuestLoc_APoorlyThoughtOutPlan_QuestLong: Raiders captured and attempted to domesticate a Deathclaw. It did not go well. They all need to die.
en.QuestLoc_APoorlyThoughtOutPlan_QuestShor: Kill the Raiders and their Deathclaw.
en.QuestLoc_APoorlyThoughtOutPlan_RaiderLin: I knew taming Deathclaws was a bad idea!
First the Deathclaw, now Dwellers? This is not my day.
en.QuestLoc_ASettlerNeedsYourHelp_Conversat: There's a Glowing One I saw somewhere around here. Look out for her.
There's a bunch of supplies in the Manager's Office if you haven't found it yet. Might be something useful.
“Protect the people at a minute's notice.” That was the idea.
Man, I don't know who you are, but your timing's impeccable.
I came here to search for supplies when these ghouls got the drop on me.
I'm ready to go whenever you are!
Any bad guys I should look out for around here?
en.QuestLoc_ASettlerNeedsYourHelp_QuestLong: Minuteman Preston Garvey has gotten himself stuck in the Kendall Hospital surrounded by Feral Ghouls and who knows what else. Save him!
en.QuestLoc_ASettlerNeedsYourHelp_QuestObje: Find Preston Garvey in Kendall Hospital.
en.QuestLoc_ASettlerNeedsYourHelp_QuestShor: Find Preston Garvey in the Kendall Hospital.
en.QuestLoc_AThirstforAdventure_Conversatio: Oh sure! Nice lady. The Ferals dragged her away, to some abandoned building.
Phew! You folks saved my bacon! Those Feral Ghouls are no joke!
Artie, Artie Moore. Explorer, scavenger, all around awesome guy.
en.QuestLoc_AThirstforAdventure_QuestLongDe: Paula Plumbkin wasn't at Vault 730, but a helpful Raider told you she set out for the old Nuka-Cola plant. Go track her down!
en.QuestLoc_AThirstforAdventure_QuestShortD: Follow the path of Paula Plumbkin to the old Nuka-Cola Plant.
en.QuestLoc_AWinningSeason_Conversation_1_N: Another note on the ground! Let me guess: It's from Coach...
All right, I've got to give you Dwellers credit.
en.QuestLoc_AWinningSeason_QuestLongDescrip: We have word that a fierce Alpha Deathclaw has taken up residence in an old office building. Maybe it killed Coach! Dare to dream, right?
en.QuestLoc_AWinningSeason_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_AgainstTheOdds_Conversation_1_N: You may have made it this far, but now you're done!
Once I'm through with you, I'm gonna start a new, better gang!
en.QuestLoc_AgainstTheOdds_QuestLongDescrip: Okay, maybe 77 is an exaggeration, but there are a lot of them, and only one of you. Have you got what it takes?
en.QuestLoc_AgainstTheOdds_RaiderLine_1: You'll never defeat all of us!
en.QuestLoc_AimfortheHead_QuestLongDescript: Time to go after something a little smarter: Feral Ghouls! And speaking of smart, you'll have to do it wearing lab coats!
en.QuestLoc_AnimalRescue_QuestLongDescripti: You're not going to leave adorable animals trapped in that building, are you?
en.QuestLoc_AnybodyHome_QuestLongDescriptio: You came across an old cabin while adventuring in the Wasteland. Perhaps you should see what's inside.
en.QuestLoc_AnybodyHome_QuestShortDescripti: You found a Cabin in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_ArmsRace_Conversation_1_NPCStar: That was close! I guess you heard my message, huh?
Well, as promised, I've got a weapon for you.
Or would you prefer Caps instead?
en.QuestLoc_ArmsRace_QuestLongDescription: The gunsmith's plea came in loud and clear over the radio. “Feral Ghouls! Help! I'll give one of my best pieces to whoever bails me out!” Better hurry if you're going to claim that prize!
en.QuestLoc_ArmsRace_QuestShortDescription: Save the gunsmith from the Feral Ghouls.
en.QuestLoc_BacktotheOutfield_Conversation_: We've come up empty again! Darn that caustic Coach!
en.QuestLoc_BacktotheOutfield_QuestLongDesc: We found a note from someone named Coach, who claims he has Rackie Jobinson's Jersey! Maybe he's hiding out in the ruins of Vault 428...
en.QuestLoc_BacktotheOutfield_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_BeanballtotheFace_Conversation_: I hear you've been searching for Rackie Jobinson's Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_BeanballtotheFace_QuestLongDesc: Assuming Coach doesn't have the Jersey, there's reason to believe Rackie Jobinson once stayed at the old Le Pierre Hotel. We'll check there!
en.QuestLoc_BeanballtotheFace_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_BewareofOverdog_Conversation_1_: He was the most qualified, obviously. What's that, Overseer? You want to go with them? I suppose I could run things while you're gone...
Wait! I think our Overseer wants to go with you. He says it'll help diplomatic relations between our two Vaults.
No, I'm not! Tell them I'm not crazy, Overseer! What's that? Oh, you want to go with them? I guess that would be all right...
Me? The Overseer? No, our Vault is run by this dog.
He's such a good boy! He sent the distress signal!
How'd a dog get to be Overseer?
Well, we're glad to have helped...
We're almost 100% certain that you're crazy.
en.QuestLoc_BewareofOverdog_QuestLongDescri: The Overseer from Vault 850 has sent us a distress signal! The catch is the Overseer is apparently a dog...
en.QuestLoc_BewareofOverdog_QuestShortDescr: Go to Vault 850 and find the Overseer.
en.QuestLoc_BreakingalltheRecords_Conversat: I could have SWORN this was the one. Guess not.
en.QuestLoc_BreakingalltheRecords_QuestLong: There's an old Wilson Automatoys factory we never checked out. Maybe Coach, and Rackie Jobinson's Jersey, are there...
en.QuestLoc_BreakingalltheRecords_QuestObje: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_BugHunt_QuestLongDescription: Hunter Big Wes has put out a series of challenges for anyone brave enough. The first is to bag a Glowing Radroach. Time to lock and load!
en.QuestLoc_BugHunt_QuestShortDescription: Kill the Glowing Radroach in the factory.
en.QuestLoc_Burnout_QuestLongDescription: Mole rats! Is there any creature more sneaky or disgusting? Grab a flamer and clear out a nest of those tunnelling terrors.
en.QuestLoc_Burnout_QuestObjective_1: Clear out the Mole rat nest.
en.QuestLoc_Burnout_QuestShortDescription: Put a nest of pesky Mole rats to the torch.
en.QuestLoc_CanineRecovery_Conversation_1_N: That flea bag ran off with the others. Probably to Vault 199. It'll be the first place we look once we're finished with you!
Intruders! You must be the ones that freed our prisoners.
We didn't spend all that time tying them up and keeping them alive, just for them to run away! Talk about rude.
No one appreciates good captors these days!
en.QuestLoc_CanineRecovery_QuestLongDescrip: I need to search an old warehouse to try and find Bigsby. The Raiders are using it as a hideout, so I'll need to be careful.
en.QuestLoc_CanineRecovery_QuestShortDescri: Look for Bigsby in the old warehouse.
en.QuestLoc_CantStopTheSignal_Conversation_: Do you know how long it took me to set this up?
I was going to have an army of Radroaches at my disposal.
en.QuestLoc_CantStopTheSignal_QuestLongDesc: A strange, high-pitched sound is coming through over the radio. The signal seems to originate from an old, abandoned builidng.
en.QuestLoc_CapsRun_QuestLongDescription: There's a large stash of Caps out there in the Wasteland with your name on it.
en.QuestLoc_CapsRun_QuestObjective_1: Recover the main stash of Caps.
en.QuestLoc_CapsRun_QuestShortDescription: Find the hidden stash of Caps.
en.QuestLoc_CapturedCritter_QuestLongDescri: There's a lost and lonely animal who'd love to come home to your Vault. Too bad some hungry Ghouls found it first.
en.QuestLoc_CapturedCritter_QuestObjective_: Rescue the Pet from the hungry Ghouls.
en.QuestLoc_CapturedCritter_QuestShortDescr: Save a lost Pet from some hungry Ghouls.
en.QuestLoc_CheapBeerintheBleacherSeats_Con: No Jersey in sight. Though I do see a nice polyester leisure suit.
en.QuestLoc_CheapBeerintheBleacherSeats_Que: If Coach was at Lakeville Library, he checked out of there a long time ago. Maybe he went to Fallon's Department Store for some slacks to match that Jersey...
Cheap Beer in the Bleacher Seats
Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ChooChoo_QuestLongDescription: One of your Dwellers won’t stop calling himself “The Pain Train.” Let’s make that nickname a reality...
en.QuestLoc_ChooChoo_QuestShortDescription: Send a lone Vault Dweller with a Railway Rifle out to wreck havoc!
en.QuestLoc_ChooChoo_RaiderLine_1: So you're the Pain Train? Don't make me laugh!
en.QuestLoc_CleanUpOnAisleFive_QuestLongDes: A group of Raiders that have been preying on the locals is using a Super Duper Mart as their headquarters. Time to take down their leader!
en.QuestLoc_CleanUpOnAisleFive_QuestObjecti: Kill the Raider Boss at the Super Duper Mart.
en.QuestLoc_CleanUpOnAisleFive_QuestShortDe: Kill the Raider Boss at the Super Duper Mart.
en.QuestLoc_CleanUpOnAisleFive_RaiderLine_1: What kind of coffin do you want, paper or plastic?!
en.QuestLoc_CleanUpOnAisleFive_RaiderLine_2: Time to make a mess. Clean up on aisle five!
en.QuestLoc_ConferenceontheMound_Conversati: Major shocker - Rackie Jobinson's Jersey isn't here.
en.QuestLoc_ConferenceontheMound_QuestLongD: No luck in the General Atomics factory, but there's always the abandoned Vault 616.
en.QuestLoc_ConferenceontheMound_QuestObjec: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_CoveWatch_Conversation_1_NPCSta: Everybody wants to be famous - well I'll tell this story for a good long time!
en.QuestLoc_CoveWatch_QuestLongDescription: The Vault has received word of a TV pilot filming nearby. It's almost certainly a trap, but send your most physically attractive Dwellers dressed for the part just in case.
en.QuestLoc_CoveWatch_QuestShortDescription: Auditions for a TV Show, or trap? Probably trap.
en.QuestLoc_CoveWatch_RaiderLine_1: You fell for it? There's no water anywhere NEAR here!
en.QuestLoc_CoveringAlltheBases_Conversatio: Again, with the coming up empty. Argh!
en.QuestLoc_CoveringAlltheBases_QuestLongDe: Still no sign of Coach, or Rackie Jobinson's Jersey. Time to venture farther out. No risk, no reward!
en.QuestLoc_CoveringAlltheBases_QuestObject: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_CrossingPaths_Conversation_1_NP: That's too bad. Well, at least let me reward you for your trouble.
Suit yourself. Well, at least let me reward you for your trouble.
You could have fooled me. Well, at least let me reward you for your trouble.
Sorry you feel that way. Well, at least let me reward you for your trouble.
That was a fine piece of work, civilian.
You ever think about joining the Brotherhood of Steel?
en.QuestLoc_CrossingPaths_Conversation_1_Te: Maybe one day, but I don't think I'm ready yet.
Heck no! I'd rather stay in my Vault.
I was never cut out to be a soldier.
No way! Soldiers caused this mess in the first place.
en.QuestLoc_CrossingPaths_QuestLongDescript: Star-Paladin Cross was collecting technology from a Super-Duper Mart when he was accosted by a Deathclaw. Lend him a hand.
en.QuestLoc_CrossingPaths_QuestObjective_1: Provide fire support for Star-Paladin Cross.
en.QuestLoc_CrossingPaths_QuestShortDescrip: Provide fire support for Star-Paladin Cross.
en.QuestLoc_DenofThieves_Conversation_1_NPC: You want to play it rough? Then let's go!
Here, these are all the Caps I've got.
They're yours if you let me go!
en.QuestLoc_DenofThieves_Conversation_1_Tea: Hand over those Caps, and you can walk out of here.
No deal. You're going to pay for what you did.
en.QuestLoc_DenofThieves_QuestLongDescripti: Red Rachel is a ruthless Raider boss, and she's stolen some of your supplies. Take back what's yours, and teach that reckless rogue a lesson!
en.QuestLoc_DenofThieves_QuestShortDescript: Reclaim the stolen supplies from the Raiders.
en.QuestLoc_DiplomaticMission_Conversation_: Very well. Here's what we have!
I think we can spare a few implements of destruction.
I think we have something right up your alley!
It's the diplomats from the Vault!
We have a gift for you, but our settlement can only send you back with one thing.
We'll take whatever weapons you have.
Our Vault has great fashion sense. We want more outfits.
en.QuestLoc_DiplomaticMission_QuestLongDesc: A local settlement wants to make contact with our Vault! We should send some diplomats.
en.QuestLoc_DiplomaticMission_QuestShortDes: Send a team in Formal Wear out to talk to a settlement.
en.QuestLoc_DoitfortheBatBoy_Conversation_1: There it is! The... Wait... no. That's a ripped football uniform.
en.QuestLoc_DoitfortheBatBoy_QuestLongDescr: If I were a conniving Coach, where would I be? Maybe in the gym of Harriet Tubman High School? It's worth a shot...
en.QuestLoc_DoitfortheBatBoy_QuestName: Do it for the Bat Boy!
en.QuestLoc_DoitfortheBatBoy_QuestObjective: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_FamilyMatters_Conversation_1_NP: She's my grandma, but careful, she's a biter. Papa was too until he lost his dentures. They both mean well! Call it tough love.
Sure is, but careful, she's a biter. Papa used to be until he lost his dentures. But they both mean well! I call it tough love.
Nana didn't tell me we were expecting guests!
Oh my, I should have tidied up.
en.QuestLoc_FamilyMatters_QuestLongDescript: You came across a small cabin out in the Wasteland. Maybe someone still lives here.
en.QuestLoc_FamilyMatters_QuestShortDescrip: You've discovered an old Cabin out in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_Firestarter_QuestLongDescriptio: One of your Dwellers is a serial arsonist. We’ve decided to employ their talents outside the Vault.
en.QuestLoc_Firestarter_QuestShortDescripti: Send a lone Vault Dweller with a Flamethrower out to wreck havoc!
en.QuestLoc_Firestarter_RaiderLine_1: Nice flamethrower. Let's see if you know how to use it!
en.QuestLoc_Firestarter_RaiderLine_3: Time to snuff you out, pyro!
en.QuestLoc_FollowingHisFirstSteps_Conversa: Yes! That's the one. Left here and headed to that factory across the river to take out Road Rash and his gang of Raiders!
He was heading towards the automobile factory to take out that Raider gang living there.
Oh, thank goodness! Someone found us!
You have to help us, that Minuteman left us before we could find a way out of here!
Said someone else needed his help and disappeared.
Did he mention where he was going?
en.QuestLoc_FollowingHisFirstSteps_QuestLon: Famed Minuteman, Preston Garvey, has gone missing! Search for clues to his whereabouts at his last known location.
en.QuestLoc_FollowingHisFirstSteps_QuestObj: Search the office building for clues.
en.QuestLoc_FollowingHisFirstSteps_QuestSho: Search for clues to Preston Garvey's location.
en.QuestLoc_GameofVaults_Conversation_1_NPC: Thanks, pal. You really saved my bacon! I thought I was Deathclaw chow for sure!
en.QuestLoc_GameofVaults_Conversation_1_Tea: Hark, fair maiden! It is I, your savior. Come forth and ride with me out of this beast's den.
en.QuestLoc_GameofVaults_QuestLongDescripti: Hear ye, Hear ye! A fierce and loathesome beast has been terrorizing the villagers througout the land. Track it to it's lair and slay the creature.
en.QuestLoc_GetchaPeanutsHere_Conversation_: Wait! On the floor! Is that... Nope. Sorry. Just an old rag.
en.QuestLoc_GetchaPeanutsHere_QuestLongDesc: We've searched a few locations, but still haven't found Coach, or the Jersey. Maybe the old Super Duper Mart holds the key!
en.QuestLoc_GetchaPeanutsHere_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_Getting Started_QuestLongDescri: For your training mission, Vault-Tec asks you to prove yourself as a worthy Overseer and kill a Glowing Radroach.
en.QuestLoc_Getting Started_QuestShortDescr: Kill the Glowing Radroach and complete your training.
en.QuestLoc_Ghooooooooooooooooooul_Conversa: Absolutely! And here, take this, as well!
Well, no need to be rude. I didn't ask for you to come barging in here.
What the..? You scared me! I haven't had visitors in a long while.
And look at those outfits! You must be sports fans!
Do you remember the Rockville Ravens? I used to play quarterback for them! Before the war...
Holy cow! Can I have your autograph?
No, we've never heard of you, gramp.
en.QuestLoc_Ghooooooooooooooooooul_QuestLon: Strange radio signals have been emitting from Vault 93. Sounds like old sports broadcasts from before the bombs dropped. Go check it out!
en.QuestLoc_GuardianoftheWastes:Deathclaws_: Let's do our part to protect the Wasteland by clearing out a nearby nest of dangerous, irradiated creatures!
en.QuestLoc_GuardianoftheWastes:FeralGhouls: Let's do our part to protect the Wasteland by clearing out a nearby nest of dangerous, irradiated creatures!
Guardian of the Wastes: Feral Ghouls!
Show the Feral Ghouls no mercy.
en.QuestLoc_GuardianoftheWastes:MoleRats_Qu: Let's do our part to protect the Wasteland by clearing out a nearby nest of dangerous, irradiated creatures!
Guardian of the Wastes: Mole rats!
Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother.
Get rid of those pesky Mole rats.
en.QuestLoc_GuardianoftheWastes:Radroaches_: Let's do our part to protect the Wasteland by clearing out a nearby nest of dangerous, irradiated creatures!
Clear out the nest of Radroaches.
en.QuestLoc_GuardianoftheWastes:Radscorpion: Let's do our part to protect the Wasteland by clearing out a nearby nest of dangerous, irradiated creatures!
en.QuestLoc_HaveGunWillTravel_Conversation_: I think they headed to the Wilson Atomatoys Factory. Good luck!
You looking for those Brotherhood soldiers?
Yeah! Do you know where they went?
en.QuestLoc_HaveGunWillTravel_QuestLongDesc: You found the holotape records of Maxson's Roughnecks, a Brotherhood of Steel team searching the Wasteland for technology. Track them down to discover their fate - starting at Vault 450!
en.QuestLoc_HaveGunWillTravel_QuestShortDes: Discover the fate of Maxson's Roughnecks.
en.QuestLoc_HeresthePitch_Conversation_1_NP: Not here. But it won't be long now.
en.QuestLoc_HeresthePitch_QuestLongDescript: Coach wasn't in Vault 789, but the place did have a familiar, sour smell... We're following the stench to Sandra's Stationary Store!
en.QuestLoc_HeresthePitch_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_HerestoYouRackieJobinson_Conver: Time to send you back down to the minors!
Oh, you're gonna strike out sooooo hard!
Now this is a real bench clearer!
Hmmm. Okay, sure. Why not. But be careful. Coach is no joke!
Wow! I heard about you! Searching the Wasteland fooorreevveer...
Well, you're in the right place! Rackie Jobinson's Jersey is here!
But you ain't never gonna get it!
When our Coach sees you, it'll be the final inning!
Do you have any idea what we've been through? That Outfit's Ours!
Coach shmoach! We're not leaving without that Outfit!
Pfft. Please. We could do this in our sleep at this point.
We've been in, like, a million fights. I don't suppose you'd just walk away?
We meet at last, you Dweller doofuses!
You like my notes? Ha ha ha ha ha.
Look, I don't know why you want Rackie Jobinson's Jersey so bad...
Try not to bleed to much on my Jersey!
en.QuestLoc_HerestoYouRackieJobinson_QuestL: This is it. The last place Rackie Jobinson's Jersey could possible be - the Museum of Baseball!
en.QuestLoc_HerestoYouRackieJobinson_QuestO: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_HomeFieldAdvantage_Conversation: So close... but yet so far.
en.QuestLoc_HomeFieldAdvantage_QuestLongDes: Could Coach be hiding out in the old pencil factory? Probably not. But we're going to look there anyway.
en.QuestLoc_HomeFieldAdvantage_QuestObjecti: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_HomerunDerby_Conversation_1_NPC: If Coach was here with the Jersey, he's long gone now.
en.QuestLoc_HomerunDerby_QuestLongDescripti: Call it a gut feeling, but Coach may be taking a breather in the ruins of Holy Heart Hospital. If he's there, so is Rackie Jobinson's Jersey!
en.QuestLoc_HomerunDerby_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_Homerun_Conversation_1_NPCStart: I smell something foul! Coach must have been here recently!
en.QuestLoc_Homerun_QuestLongDescription: Still no Coach, and no Rackie Jobinson's Jersey. But he's close! I can sense it. Or maybe it's just his lingering B.O. In any event, it's time to search the Precious Paws Pet Store!
en.QuestLoc_Homerun_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_HorrorMovieNight_QuestLongDescr: One of your Dwellers is feeling... “inspired” by a horror movie he watched.
en.QuestLoc_HorrorMovieNight_QuestShortDesc: Send out a lone Vault Dweller wearing a Horror Fan Outfit to wreck havoc!
en.QuestLoc_HorrorMovieNight_RaiderLine_1: Think you're scary, pal? Get him!
en.QuestLoc_HostageNegotiations_Conversatio: I don't even have to go looking for chumps to grab.
Now they just come straight to me!
I've been stuck in here for so long.
I don't know what they would have done to me!
Here, this is all I can offer you.
I never thought I'd make it out of here alive!
I don't have much, but it's all yours!
en.QuestLoc_HostageNegotiations_QuestLongDe: Raiders have been snatching up folks all over the Wasteland. Put an end to their scheme, and save their victims.
en.QuestLoc_HostageNegotiations_QuestShortD: Defeat the kidnappers and save their victims.
en.QuestLoc_HotTubSlimeMachine_Conversation: What the..? More adventurers looking for the pool?
We drained that thing years ago so we could have drinking water!
Sorry you came all this way. Here, maybe this will make up for it.
en.QuestLoc_HotTubSlimeMachine_QuestLongDes: Rumors have been circulating about a Vault with a pool, sauna, and even a hot tub! Search Vault 189 to find this oasis of relaxation, but beware of the ghoul infestation!
en.QuestLoc_HotTubSlimeMachine_QuestShortDe: Find the pool room in Vault 189.
en.QuestLoc_HowCanYouNotBeRomanticAboutBase: Rackie Jobinson's Jersey continues to elude us!
Okay, so Holy Heart Hospital was a dead end. But at least we're still alive! Next stop, the ruins of Lakeville Library.
How Can You Not Be Romantic About Baseball?
Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_IDontKnowsonThird_Conversation_: There's something written on the back...
This is as close as you're going to get! - Coach
en.QuestLoc_IDontKnowsonThird_QuestLongDesc: If Coach has the Jersey, maybe he needs to keep it clean. We're off to search the BubblySuds Laundromat!
en.QuestLoc_IDontKnowsonThird_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_InAnotherVault_Conversation_1_N: Our salvage team took Bigsby to the Atomatoys warehouse, but hasn't returned. Take this. You'll need it if you look for them.
You must be another of those poor souls that escaped from the Raiders.
en.QuestLoc_InAnotherVault_Conversation_1_T: No, but I'm looking for a dog that was with them named Bigsby.
en.QuestLoc_InAnotherVault_QuestLongDescrip: Bigsby wasn't in Vault 199, but a member told me he may be in their sister Vault: 899. I should go check it out.
en.QuestLoc_IntoVault333_Conversation_1_NPC: Go kill that Raider jerk, Frank the Tank. He's in that building down the road. This might help.
Could you kill Frank the Tank? He raids us all the time. He's in that building down the road. This might help.
Tell you what. You kill Frank the Tank. He's in that building down the road. Then we'll talk. This might help.
Whoa whoa whoa. Hold it right there. I'm Overseer Patel.
You can't just walk around in here all willy nilly!
We've had a lot of trouble with Raiders lately. Trust has to be earned!
en.QuestLoc_IntoVault333_Conversation_1_Tea: Ugh. Fine. What do we need to do?
Gladly! What can we do to help?
Dang it, we've got questions! And you're going to answer them!
en.QuestLoc_IntoVault333_QuestLongDescripti: Paula Plumbkin escaped from the Feral Ghouls and headed to Vault 333. Hopefully we can catch up with her there.
en.QuestLoc_IntoVault333_QuestShortDescript: Explore Vault 333 and find Paula Plumbkin.
en.QuestLoc_IntotheInfield_Conversation_1_N: What's this? A note on the ground?
So you're looking for Rackie Jobinson's Jersey, huh?
en.QuestLoc_IntotheInfield_QuestLongDescrip: Maybe Rackie Jobinson's Jersey is in the Clear Morning Place Insane Asylum!
en.QuestLoc_IntotheInfield_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_IntotheOutfield_Conversation_1_: Okay, fine. You've proven I can't avoid you forever.
en.QuestLoc_IntotheOutfield_QuestLongDescri: Coach wasn't in the pet store, but there's a warehouse close by. He may have headed there...
en.QuestLoc_IntotheOutfield_QuestObjective_: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_JourneytotheCenterofVaultopolis: Journey to the Center of Vaultopolis
en.QuestLoc_JunkRun_QuestLongDescription: The Wasteland is full of junk, but sometimes that's just what you need...
en.QuestLoc_JunkRun_QuestObjective_1: Recover the main stash of Junk.
en.QuestLoc_JunkRun_QuestShortDescription: We need more junk. Go get it!
en.QuestLoc_JuuussstttaBitOutside_QuestLong: Okay, so the Raiders didn't lead us to Coach. It was worth a shot. Maybe he's taking a nap in the old mattress factory!
en.QuestLoc_JuuussstttaBitOutside_QuestObje: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_KidnappingatVault778_Conversati: He didn't say. Not that it matters, you're never leaving this room alive!
Check out the Vault Dwellers. Here to save your friends?
I'll tell you the same thing I told that Minuteman jerk. You ain't leaving this place alive!
Too bad he slipped away before I could torture him.
Think he said something about the Kendall Hospital. Take this. He left it on accident, but I think you could use it.
Finally! You're not going to abandon us like that last guy, are you?
He just left us! I guess he had more important places to be.
en.QuestLoc_KidnappingatVault778_QuestLongD: Some Raiders have kidnapped some settlers and have them held hostage at Vault 778. Maybe they know where Preston Garvey went.
en.QuestLoc_KidnappingatVault778_QuestShort: Save the kidnapped settlers in Vault 778.
en.QuestLoc_KidnappingatVault778_RaiderLine: They're here for the Settlers! Kill them!
en.QuestLoc_LastInningOrnot_Conversation_1_: No Jersey. I might have known.
en.QuestLoc_LastInningOrnot_QuestLongDescri: Maybe Rackie Jobinson got his amazing athletic prowess from drinking lots of coffee. It's time to search the Slocum's Joe!
en.QuestLoc_LastInningOrnot_QuestObjective_: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_LetsKnockitOuttathePark_Convers: You made it! So I guess you found my note. I'm Henrietta.
I hear you're looking for Rackie Jobinson's Jersey. Well, Coach has it!
I loved him once, you know. But he's nothing but a cheating jerk!
Here. Use this to kill Coach. And tell him Henrietta said hello!
en.QuestLoc_LetsKnockitOuttathePark_QuestLo: A note from someone named Henrietta has led us to Vault 232. Hopefully she can lead us to Rackie Jobinson's Jersey!
en.QuestLoc_LetsKnockitOuttathePark_QuestNa: Let's Knock it Outta the Park!
en.QuestLoc_LetsKnockitOuttathePark_QuestOb: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_LunchboxRun_QuestLongDescriptio: You've found the location of a Vault-Tec Lunchbox! Now we just need to send some volunteers to retrieve it.
en.QuestLoc_MVPoftheYear_Conversation_1_NPC: Coach isn't here. The Jersey's not here.
en.QuestLoc_MVPoftheYear_QuestLongDescripti: The Alpha Deathclaw hadn't killed Coach, but the big bad guy did leave another note! So at least we know he's still out there. The search continues!
en.QuestLoc_MVPoftheYear_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ManonFirst_Conversation_1_NPCSt: Darn it! The Jersey's not here. The search continues!
en.QuestLoc_ManonFirst_QuestLongDescription: Somewhere out there in the Wasteland is the Jersey of legendary baseball player Rackie Jobinson. Let's find it!
en.QuestLoc_ManonFirst_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ManonSecond_Conversation_1_NPCS: Nope, not here. We'll have to keep looking.
en.QuestLoc_ManonSecond_QuestLongDescriptio: Okay, so the first location was a bust. On to the second. The Quest to find Rackie Jobinson's Jersey continues!
en.QuestLoc_ManonSecond_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ManonThird_QuestLongDescription: No Jersey yet, but maybe third time's the charm!
en.QuestLoc_ManonThird_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_MiseryLoathesCompany_QuestLongD: A tough Raider boss is holed up in a Red Rocket fuel station, and he's using your Wasteland explorer for target practice. Take him out before someone gets hurt!
en.QuestLoc_MiseryLoathesCompany_QuestShort: Challenge a Raider Boss holed up in a Red Rocket Truck Stop.
en.QuestLoc_MiseryLoathesCompany_RaiderLine: Fresh meat, huh? Good, I was gettin' lonely!
en.QuestLoc_MissionofMercy_Conversation_1_N: Ha, ha, ha! You're here looking for Maxson's Roughnecks?
Don't worry, they're, uh, safe and sound at Vault-Tec Headquarters.
Now all you have to do is live long enough to find them!
en.QuestLoc_MissionofMercy_QuestLongDescrip: I stumbled across a Ghoul who used to be one of Maxson's Roughnecks. He told me the rest of his team is trapped in Vault 390. It's time for a rescue mission!
en.QuestLoc_MondayNightBrawl_Conversation_1: Oh yeah? We'll see about that.
Get ready to make your first cap, then!
What the hell are you supposed to be?
We're the punishment you've had coming for a long time, Embalmer!
I came here to drink Nuka-Cola and kill chumps like you. And I'm all out of Nuka-Cola.
If we had a bottle cap for everytime we lost to chumps like you, we'd have ZERO CAPS!
en.QuestLoc_MondayNightBrawl_Conversation_2: Big words. Let's see if you can back them up.
I didn't realize the circus was in town.
The only clown I see here is you, Hatchet!
Yeah, I'm the circus magician. My first trick is making all your teeth disappear.
Meet the Human Cannonball. And I'm gonna blast right through you if you don't get out of my way!
en.QuestLoc_MondayNightBrawl_Conversation_3: Hold still and this beating will be over faster.
Get ready to get hurt real bad, Vault Dweller!
You ever pick up your teeth with broken fingers?
I've had just about enough of you stupid idiots tearing through my gang!
I'm not only going to embarrass you, I'm gonna take you out for good!
I hope you've made your peace, Bednarski, because you're not walking away from this one.
And I've had enough of you, Bednarski! Time to take you out like the trash.
en.QuestLoc_MondayNightBrawl_QuestLongDescr: A nearby Raider gang is calling you out! Time to show them who's boss...in style! Strap on your ring gear and start kicking butt!
en.QuestLoc_MondayNightBrawl_RaiderLine_2: You've got to be kidding me!
en.QuestLoc_MyMetalPony_Conversation_1_NPCE: We're not giving up without a fight!
en.QuestLoc_MyMetalPony_Conversation_1_NPCS: Oh, hi there! Wasn't expecting to meet anyone today.
We just found this great Giddyup Buttercup! We're...
Why are you looking at me like that?
Oh, no - you are NOT taking this!
en.QuestLoc_MyMetalPony_Conversation_1_Team: This is a one-horse town, buddy.
Drop the reins and step away.
Give it up, or it's off to the glue factory for you.
en.QuestLoc_MyMetalPony_QuestLongDescriptio: Will you use it for spare parts, or riding in your spare time? Up to you, you're the Overseer. Send Dwellers to get one!
en.QuestLoc_MyWeirdScienceProject_QuestLong: What better way to learn about the deadly Glowing Radscorpion than first-hand observation? Send your research team to the monster's lair. Of course, you'll need to kill it first.
en.QuestLoc_MyWeirdScienceProject_QuestShor: Kill the Glowing Radscorpion in the name of science!
en.QuestLoc_NoStoneUnturned_Conversation_1_: The few that are left decided to cleanse the Nuka-Cola Plant of its Feral Ghoul infestation.
Thanks for your help. Those Radscorpions chased off the rest of my team.
My pleasure. Where did the rest of your team go?
en.QuestLoc_NoStoneUnturned_QuestLongDescri: Some of Maxson's Roughnecks were killed at the Wilson Atomatoys Factory, the rest retreated to the Poseidon Energy Offices. That's where I need to go.
en.QuestLoc_NoStoneUnturned_QuestShortDescr: Find the rest of Maxson's Roughnecks at the Poseidon Energy Offices.
en.QuestLoc_NoTimeforPaws_Conversation_1_NP: I didn't realize he already had a home! You're one lucky owner. Here he is! Bigsby! You can come out now!
Did Brody send you? I thought we were goners!
We just made it inside when those mole rats and radscorps turned the floor into swiss cheese.
Good thing Bigsby was here. He heard them and saved my life!
en.QuestLoc_NoTimeforPaws_Conversation_1_Te: I'm here to find Bigsby, and bring him home. Please say he's with you...
en.QuestLoc_NoTimeforPaws_QuestLongDescript: I rescued the salvage team, but Bigsby wasn't with them. One said they may have taken shelter in Vault 314.
en.QuestLoc_NoTimeforPaws_QuestShortDescrip: Find Sally and Bigsby in Vault 314.
en.QuestLoc_NukaColaQuantumRun_QuestLongDes: We think we know where a rare Nuka-Cola Quantum is located!
en.QuestLoc_NukaColaQuantumRun_QuestShortDe: Search for the lost Nuka-Cola Quantum.
en.QuestLoc_OneGhoulCustomer_Conversation_1: Here, maybe you should have the Quantum for safe keeping.
Oh, well maybe you should have it for safe keeping.
Oh, what a good idea. Here you go!
Of course! It's the ultimate refreshment. Here, try one.
Oh my goodness! I'm so glad you're here!
Those horrible Ghouls were trying to steal my Nuka-Cola Quantum.
You're crazy, lady. They were after you, not your Quantum.
Maybe I should hang on to that Nuka-Cola Quantum so you'll be safe.
You care more about the Nuka-Cola Quantum than your life?
en.QuestLoc_OneGhoulCustomer_QuestLongDescr: Sierra Petrovita has been trapped by Ghouls at the local Super-Duper Mart. Rescue her before they make her their next meal.
en.QuestLoc_OutfitRun_QuestLongDescription: You've gotten a lead to a supply of Outfits out in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_OutfitRun_QuestObjective_1: Recover the main stash of Outfits.
en.QuestLoc_OutoftheVaultIntotheShadows_Con: Whatever, like I care. Get ready to die!
Ambushed by a bunch of weirdos in their pajamas?!?
You have brought dishonor to your name, Eli Calvert.
en.QuestLoc_OutoftheVaultIntotheShadows_Que: For too long, the evil bandit Eli Calvert has raided the innocent Dwellers of the Wasteland. For the honor of your Vault, assemble your ninjas and rain death upon Eli and his gang of madmen!
Out of the Vault, Into the Shadows
Destroy Eli Calvert's Raiders with your Ninja Death Squad.
en.QuestLoc_OutoftheVaultIntotheShadows_Rai: What the..? Where did you come from?!?
en.QuestLoc_Overrun_Conversation_1_NPCEnd_1: Fine. She said something about the nuclear power plant. Now die!
en.QuestLoc_Overrun_Conversation_1_NPCStart: No! You killed my precious pets! My radical Radscorpions!
First that annoying Paula Plumbkin, and now you.
At least she had the decency to leave my babies alone.
en.QuestLoc_Overrun_Conversation_1_Team_1: Yes! Tell us where Paula Plumbkin went.
en.QuestLoc_Overrun_QuestLongDescription: Overseer Patel's journal indicated Paula Plumbkin had gone to Vault 909, but that it had already been overrun! Hopefully she's okay...
en.QuestLoc_OverwhelmingForce_QuestLongDesc: There’s no sense toying around with Raiders when we can just crush them! Send a group loaded with Power Armor out to a local Raider camp and deal with their Boss.
en.QuestLoc_OverwhelmingForce_QuestShortDes: Send a group of Dwellers in Power Armor to clear out a Raider camp.
en.QuestLoc_OverwhelmingForce_RaiderLine_1: Power Armor!? These Dwellers mean business!
en.QuestLoc_OverwhelmingForce_RaiderLine_2: You think those tin cans are gonna stop me from raiding these Wastes!?
en.QuestLoc_PaulasinaPickle_Conversation_1_: I think she mentioned visiting some Vault? Vault 333? That's a lot of threes...
Are you the rescue squad? I sure hope so!
I'm Mandy Macintosh. The Feral Ghouls captured a bunch of us.
I think they were saving us all for a snack!
One lady, Paula Plumbkin, managed to escape. She's my new hero!
Did Paula say where she was going?
en.QuestLoc_PaulasinaPickle_QuestLongDescri: The Feral Ghouls from the old Nuka-Cola plant dragged Paula Plumbkin to an abandoned building. She needs rescuing!
en.QuestLoc_PaulasinaPickle_QuestShortDescr: Rescue Paula Plumbkin from the Feral Ghouls!
en.QuestLoc_PestCaseScenario_QuestLongDescr: Mole rats have infested a Super-Duper Mart nearby. The location is a vital source of supplies for travelers. Kill the Brood Mother to make the location safe once again.
en.QuestLoc_PestCaseScenario_QuestObjective: Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother.
en.QuestLoc_PestCaseScenario_QuestShortDesc: Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother at the Super Duper Mart.
en.QuestLoc_PestControl_Conversation_1_NPCS: Time for a little pest control!
en.QuestLoc_PestControl_QuestLongDescriptio: Watch out! While exploring near a Red Rocket fuel station, one of your Wasteland explorers has stumbled across a nest of radroaches! Ewww!
en.QuestLoc_PestControl_QuestShortDescripti: There's a nest of nasty Radroaches at a Red Rocket Truck Stop.
en.QuestLoc_PickedOffatSecond_Conversation_: Is that... Ugh. It's just a ripped Matt “The Missile” Murtagh Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_PickedOffatSecond_QuestLongDesc: Maybe Coach is rummaging around the ruins of the old sports bar, Nick Nack Quarterback's. If he is, that Jersey's as good as ours!
en.QuestLoc_PickedOffatSecond_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_PitStop_QuestLongDescription: Opportunity knocks! One of your Wasteland explorers has discovered a Red Rocket fuel station that looks uninhabited. There might be something useful inside.
en.QuestLoc_PitStop_QuestObjective_1: Investigate the Red Rocket Truck Stop.
en.QuestLoc_PitStop_QuestShortDescription: Search the Red Rocket Truck Stop for supplies.
en.QuestLoc_PlayBall_Conversation_1_NPCStar: It's not here. And neither is Coach. So we keep looking!
en.QuestLoc_PlayBall_QuestLongDescription: We found a Rackie Jobinson baseball card with a taunting note from Coach. Looks like he really does have the Jersey. But we'll never give up!
en.QuestLoc_PlayBall_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_PlayingPolitics_Conversation_1_: The official documentation Vault-Tec sent to the Mayor's office...
...with the location of Vault 525! And they did indeed have a G.E.C.K.!
Says here the entrance was hidden in the Red Rocket Headquarters!
en.QuestLoc_PlayingPolitics_QuestLongDescri: According to a page from Paula Plumbkin's journal, Vault 525 really is Vaultopolis, but even she doesn't know where it is. But the Mayor's office may hold that information!
en.QuestLoc_PlayingPolitics_QuestObjective_: Search the Mayor's office for info on Vault 525's location.
en.QuestLoc_PlayingPolitics_QuestShortDescr: We need to search the Mayor's office to find the location of Vault 525.
en.QuestLoc_PoweredUp_Conversation_1_NPCSta: Don't shoot! I'm not like those other Ghouls!
Looking for Paula Plumbkin? She was here all right.
Paula thought this place might be Vaultopolis. Obviously not.
She headed to Vault 813. If you're following her, this might help!
en.QuestLoc_PoweredUp_QuestLongDescription: The Radscorpion's creepy keeper said Paula Plumbkin went to the nuclear power plant, so that's where we'll look for her.
en.QuestLoc_PoweredUp_QuestObjective_1: Search the nuclear power plant for Paula Plumbkin.
en.QuestLoc_PoweredUp_QuestShortDescription: Search the nuclear power plant for Paula Plumbkin.
en.QuestLoc_QueenoftheDeathclaws_QuestLongD: A Raider calling herself the Queen of the Deathclaws has been terrorizing the Wasteland!
en.QuestLoc_QueenoftheDeathclaws_QuestObjec: Kill the Queen of the Deathclaws.
en.QuestLoc_QueenoftheDeathclaws_QuestShort: Defeat an Alpha Deathclaw and the Raider controlling it.
en.QuestLoc_QueenoftheDeathclaws_RaiderLine: You think you can take us!? Our boss has her own Deathclaw bodyguard!
I raised that Deathclaw from a hatchling. You'll pay for this!
en.QuestLoc_RadiationLeak_Conversation_1_NP: The Vault armory had a few items left. Here.
We won't be needing them, anyway. Here you go.
Wait! We're not Feral! We're friendly!
The radiation changed all of us, but we still have our sanity. The others had us trapped here.
Thank you for freeing us. How can we repay you?
en.QuestLoc_RadiationLeak_Conversation_1_Te: We'll take our payment in Caps.
We could always use more outfits.
en.QuestLoc_RadiationLeak_QuestLongDescript: A neighboring Vault has had a massive radiation leak and the citizens have turned into Feral Ghouls!
en.QuestLoc_RadiationLeak_QuestShortDescrip: Send a team with Radiation Suits to a neighboring Vault.
en.QuestLoc_RaiderTroublesatCorvega_Convers: Nothing, he left before we could catch him. Said some settlers were stuck in a Mole rat den. But enough talk, now you die!
Ha, what do we have here?
Some more goody two-shoes, looking to take down Road Rash!
I'll tell you what I told that idiot Preston Garvey. No one messes with Road Rash and lives!
What did you do with Preston?
en.QuestLoc_RaiderTroublesatCorvega_QuestLo: The path has led you to the home of Road Rash and his gang of Raiders! Find out if they know anything.
en.QuestLoc_RaiderTroublesatCorvega_QuestSh: Search for Preston in the Corvega Factory.
en.QuestLoc_RainDelay_QuestLongDescription: No sign of Coach at the cereral processing plant. Maybe he's scavenging for electronics at the old General Atomics factory? Worth a looksie...
en.QuestLoc_RainDelay_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ReignofRadroachRodney_QuestLong: Radroach Rodney and his army of mind-controlled Radroaches are invading the Wasteland!
en.QuestLoc_ReignofRadroachRodney_QuestShor: Defeat Radroach Rodney and his Radroaches!
en.QuestLoc_ReignofRadroachRodney_RaiderLin: You can't stop me! This world belongs to the Radroach!
en.QuestLoc_RescueOperation_Conversation_1_: Thank goodness! You got my distress call!
en.QuestLoc_RescueOperation_QuestLongDescri: You've received a distress call from a settlement! They're willing to leave and join your Vault if you save them.
en.QuestLoc_RescueOperation_QuestShortDescr: Rescue any settlers that you can.
en.QuestLoc_ReturntoVault333_Conversation_1: Oh my goodness! It was a slaughter! A charnel nightmare!
While you were fighting Frank the Tank, his sister came here and attacked!
Overseer Patel is dead! And we're next unless you stop her! Please...
en.QuestLoc_ReturntoVault333_QuestLongDescr: Frank the Tank is dead. Now maybe the Settlers of Vault 333 will point us toward Paula Plumbkin.
en.QuestLoc_ReturntoVault333_QuestShortDesc: Return to Vault 333 and get some answers.
en.QuestLoc_ReturntoVault333_RaiderLine_1: Is it true you killed my brother? Well you ain't takin' me down!
en.QuestLoc_RobotRetrieval_QuestLongDescrip: We think Vault-Tec delivered a Mr. Handy Box to this building. Pip pip cheerio!
en.QuestLoc_RockThemLikeAHurricane_QuestLon: Let's see how you fare against a nest full of Radscorpions. Oh, and this time, you can only have two people in your squad.
en.QuestLoc_RunnersinScoringPosition_Conver: Warmer still... but not on fire yet!
en.QuestLoc_RunnersinScoringPosition_QuestL: Coach left a taunting message spray painted on the wall of the Hubris Comics store! We're closing in! Time to search the ruins of Vault 789.
en.QuestLoc_RunnersinScoringPosition_QuestO: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCEnd_1: You're a real hero! I don't have any Caps, but maybe you can make use of this.
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCEnd_2: I don't believe it! No one makes a hot dog out of Bigsby. I can't pay you, but maybe you can make some use of this.
