en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCStart_1: Thank goodness! I thought my buns were toast.
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCStart_2: Some of those Raiders left for a warehouse and took my dog, Bigsby, with them.
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCStart_3: I think they're going to eat him!
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_NPCStart_4: You've got to save him and give him a good home!
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_Team_1: Dognapping is a crime. I'll get him back!
en.QuestLoc_SOS_Conversation_1_Team_2: If anything's toast, it's your dog.
en.QuestLoc_SOS_QuestLongDescription: You've picked up a distress call from an abandoned building. Assemble a rescue team and find the source!
en.QuestLoc_SOS_QuestShortDescription: Find the source of the distress call.
en.QuestLoc_ScientificProgress_Conversation: You ain't getting nothing from me!
Okay, I can respect that. But I'm still gonna kill you!
Yeah, well you'll leave in pieces!
Why are you doing this? We ain't done nothing to you!
The future's a lot brighter without you in it!
Give me your clothes, your boots, and your motorcycle...
en.QuestLoc_ScientificProgress_QuestLongDes: Cutting-edge science requires materials and demands sacrifice. So sacrifice some Raiders in the name of Science and take all their stuff!
en.QuestLoc_ScientificProgress_QuestShortDe: Don't let anything stand in the way of Science!
en.QuestLoc_SeventhInningStretch_QuestLongD: Does Coach really have the Jersey? Evidence suggests he may be in an old office building, so it's worth a look.
en.QuestLoc_SeventhInningStretch_QuestObjec: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ShotgunWedding_QuestLongDescrip: A love-struck Raider boss has decided to get married, even though his bride-to-be wants no part of it. Save the kidnapped beauty from the clutches of her unwanted groom.
en.QuestLoc_ShotgunWedding_QuestShortDescri: Rescue the kidnapped Vault Dweller from the Raider Boss.
en.QuestLoc_ShotgunWedding_RaiderLine_1: You won't be crashin' this wedding!
en.QuestLoc_SlashandBurn_Conversation_1_NPC: No, just save the rest of my team. They're trapped in Vault 390.
You're too late. I was once a Scribe with Maxson's Roughnecks... but the radiation did this to me.
en.QuestLoc_SlashandBurn_Conversation_1_Tea: I'm so sorry. Can I help?
en.QuestLoc_SlashandBurn_QuestLongDescripti: One of Maxson's Roughnecks told me his team went to clear out a Nuka-Cola Plant. Looks like that's the next stop on my hunt.
en.QuestLoc_SlashandBurn_QuestShortDescript: Search the Nuka-Cola Plant for Maxson's Roughnecks.
en.QuestLoc_SlidingintoHome_Conversation_1_: There's a box of stale Sugar Bombs, but no Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_SlidingintoHome_QuestLongDescri: Maybe Coach got hungry and is hiding out in the old cereal processing plant. Rackie Jobinson's Jersey, here we come!
en.QuestLoc_SlidingintoHome_QuestObjective_: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_SomewhereintheBallpark_Conversa: No Jersey, but limitless adventure. Am I right?
en.QuestLoc_SomewhereintheBallpark_QuestLon: We're off to search the tenth location for Rackie Jobinson's Jersey. We may get lucky this time... right?
en.QuestLoc_SomewhereintheBallpark_QuestObj: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_Tankbusting_QuestLongDescriptio: The Overseer of Vault 333 might help us find Paula Plumbkin, but first we have to kill Frank the Tank.
en.QuestLoc_Tankbusting_QuestShortDescripti: Find and kill Frank the Tank.
en.QuestLoc_Tankbusting_RaiderLine_1: I'm Frank the Tank, and I'm gunning for you fools!
en.QuestLoc_TargetPractice_QuestLongDescrip: Your Dwellers can always use a chance to improve their weapon skills. It's not quite a target range, but the next best thing.
en.QuestLoc_The20thInning_QuestLongDescript: There's been so sign of Coach, or Rackie Jobinson's Jersey. Is he still out there? Does he really have the Jersey? Only one way to find out!
en.QuestLoc_The20thInning_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_TheBrothersGrime_Conversation_2: Vault Dweller filth! You'll pay for what you did to my brother!
Let's mop the floor with this scrub!
en.QuestLoc_TheBrothersGrime_QuestLongDescr: Few Raiders play dirtier than the two Raider bosses known as the Brothers Grime. Teach these black-hearted sibling scoundrels a lesson.
en.QuestLoc_TheBrothersGrime_QuestShortDesc: Confront a dastardly pair of Raider siblings.
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalHunt_Conversation_1_NPC: You guys are good. I can respect that.
But I'm the number one hunter in the Wasteland, not you!
You'll look great stuffed and mounted in my trophy room!
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalHunt_QuestLongDescripti: Big Wes is calling you out! Time to dethrone him and become the Wasteland's number one big game hunter.
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalHunt_QuestShortDescript: Track down and take out Big Wes.
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalPush_Conversation_1_NPC: Likewise, soldier. Here, you deserve to carry this more than we do.
Suit yourself. Here, you deserve to carry this more than we do.
Hmph. Well, here, you deserve to carry this more than we do.
We will. Here, you deserve to carry this more than we do.
Our Power Armor suits quit on us long ago. We were no match for those Deathclaws.
On behalf of the Brotherhood of Steel, we salute you!
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalPush_Conversation_1_Tea: You should be more careful next time.
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalPush_QuestLongDescripti: A Raider Boss in the ruins of Vault 390 told me that Maxson's Roughnecks are in Vault-Tec Headquarters. I'm concerned for their safety, so I better armor up and hurry!
en.QuestLoc_TheFinalPush_QuestShortDescript: Find Maxson's Roughnecks in the Vault-Tec Headquarters.
en.QuestLoc_TheGreatAmericanPastime_Convers: No Jersey, but we're getting closer! I can feel it.
en.QuestLoc_TheGreatAmericanPastime_QuestLo: Well, Coach wasn't in the sports bar. Maybe he's a teetotaler. He'd better not spill any darjeeling on that Jersey! Time to keep looking...
en.QuestLoc_TheGreatAmericanPastime_QuestOb: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_TheHauntingofVault110_Conversat: I... I didn't know! I promise, I'll leave!
What?! A disguise? I'll make you a ghost for real!
Yikes! Why didn't anyone tell me this Vault was haunted?!
P-p-please don't hurt me ghost! W-w-what is it you want?
You've defiled my resting place, mortal! Leave at once!
en.QuestLoc_TheHauntingofVault110_QuestLong: Like most bullies, Raiders are usually cowards. Rumor has it the Raider boss who just took over Vault 110 is exactly that, so maybe you can scare him off without a fight.
en.QuestLoc_TheHauntingofVault110_QuestShor: Scare off a Raider Boss holed up in a Vault.
en.QuestLoc_TheMostDangerousGame_Conversati: You're the Vault Dwellers who're hunting everything, ain't ya?
I'm gonna mount your head on my wall!
en.QuestLoc_TheMostDangerousGame_QuestLongD: Looks like you need a bigger challenge. How about hunting some humans for a change? This time you can only wear your Vault suits.
en.QuestLoc_ThePathofPaulaPlumbkin_Conversa: Some old Nuka-Cola plant. Not that it matters. You ain't leavin' here alive!
You guys are worse than that last intruder, Paula whatsername!
Plumbkin! Paula Plumbkin! Where did she go?
en.QuestLoc_ThePathofPaulaPlumbkin_QuestLon: You've found the journal of Paula Plumbkin, an Overseer who went searching for the mythical utopia, Vaultopolis. Follow in her footsteps! First stop - Vault 730.
en.QuestLoc_ThePathofPaulaPlumbkin_QuestSho: Follow the path of Paula Plumbkin to Vault 730.
en.QuestLoc_TheQuestforVault525_Conversatio: Holy cannoli! On the ground! A page from Paula Plumbkin's journal!
Needed to resupply. But I'm close. Vault 525 is Vaultopolis!
They had a G.E.C.K., and I just know they used it!
Not sure where it is, but the Mayor's office will have that info!
en.QuestLoc_TheQuestforVault525_QuestLongDe: We need to find Vault 525, but our supplies are running low. It's time to visit the Super Duper Mart and scavenge whatever we can before continuing our search.
en.QuestLoc_TheQuestforVault525_QuestObject: Resupply at the Super Duper Mart.
en.QuestLoc_TheQuestforVault525_QuestShortD: We're looking for Vault 525, but need to resupply first.
en.QuestLoc_TheRedRocketReveal_Conversation: Vaultopolis is in the Shaded Valley! Take that to your grave!
Morons! Vaultopolis is in the Shaded Valley! And you'll never see it!
In the Shaded Valley, if you must know! Now prepare to die!
Oh yes I will! I know where it is, too! The Shaded Valley! Muhahaha!
Ha! Finally, we meet in person. You've been hounding me forever!
It's me - Paula Plumbkin! The Wasteland has toughened me up!
Yes, Vault 525 is Vaultopolis! And no, it's not here! I faked that info!
I led you here to kill you! Vaultopolis is mine! I will be the Overseer!
Well. Gotta admit. I did NOT see that coming.
So if Vaultopolis isn't here, where is it?
You treacherous tart! You'll never rule Vaultopolis!
en.QuestLoc_TheRedRocketReveal_QuestLongDes: The official documentation Vault-Tec sent to the Mayor's office said that the entrance of Vault 525, a.k.a. Vaultopolis, is hidden in the Red Rocket Headquarters! What are you waiting for? Get to Vault 525!
en.QuestLoc_TheRedRocketReveal_QuestShortDe: The entrance to Vault 525 is in the Red Rocket Headquarters!
en.QuestLoc_TheRoadtoVaultopolis_Conversati: Well hey there! I'm Overseer Alvarez. Let me guess...
You're here looking for Vaultopolis, just like that Paula lady.
I'll tell you the same thing I told her - you're in the wrong place!
Vaultopolis does exist. Search the Vault-Tec offices to the north!
en.QuestLoc_TheRoadtoVaultopolis_QuestLongD: A friendly Ghoul in the nuclear power plant told us Paula Plumbkin continued her search for Vaultopolis in Vault 813. We're hot on her tail!
en.QuestLoc_TheScorpionKing_Conversation_1_: Look, I'll pay you. Just leave me alone!
I haven't got any more, thanks to you! Just take this and go!
What does that even mean? Get outta here! I'll pay you to leave!
Your business advice is as lousy as your attitude! Here, leave me alone!
Howdy folks, they call me the Radscorpion Earl!
At least they did, till you made a mess of my business!
You have any idea how much that venom sells for?
And now you've set me back years!
Peddle your poison somewhere else, scoundrel!
You've been caught in the Pincers of Justice!
Try another line of work, like farming.
en.QuestLoc_TheScorpionKing_QuestLongDescri: Folks are being stung all over, and the problem is coming from Earl's Radscorpion Emporium. Time to put him out of business.
en.QuestLoc_TheScorpionKing_RaiderLine_1: First we gotta raise bugs, now Dwellers to deal with? This job stinks!
en.QuestLoc_TheScorpionKing_RaiderLine_2: Earl ain't paying me enough to put up with this!
en.QuestLoc_TheTailContinues_Conversation_1: They're a couple of tough cookies. I'm betting Sally would've taken cover in Vault 314. It's abandoned, so be careful!
Thanks for the rescue! I thought we'd be feral chew toys by now.
And bite marks are so unbecoming!
By the way, did you see a girl and a dog?
We got split up during the ambush.
No, do you know where they went?
en.QuestLoc_TheTailContinues_QuestLongDescr: Overseer Emma said Bigsby stopped by their Vault. Since then, a salvage team took him on a run with them to the Atomatoys warehouse, but hasn’t returned.
en.QuestLoc_TheTailContinues_QuestShortDesc: Find the salvage team from Vault 899 in the old Atomatoys Warehouse.
en.QuestLoc_TheVaultTecVantage_Conversation: We found the Vault-Tec notes on Vaultopolis! They say...
There's something called a G.E.C.K. - a device that can create life!
It could create a utopia Vault. A Vaultopolis! And Vault 525 had one!
But where IS Vault 525?! Is Paula there? We have to keep looking!
en.QuestLoc_TheVaultTecVantage_QuestLongDes: Vault 813's Overseer Alvarez told us the same thing he told Paula Plumbkin - to search the Vault-Tec offices for info on Vaultopolis!
en.QuestLoc_TheVaultTecVantage_QuestObjecti: Search the Vault-Tec offices for info on Vaultopolis.
en.QuestLoc_TheVaultTecVantage_QuestShortDe: The Vault-Tec offices may hold info on Vaultopolis...
en.QuestLoc_TheVaultTecVantage_RaiderLine_1: You people, coming here, searching around! Stay off our turf!
en.QuestLoc_TheresnoCryinginBaseball_Conver: Darn it! The jersey's not here. The search continues!
en.QuestLoc_TheresnoCryinginBaseball_QuestL: There's an old Hardware Town store we haven't checked out. Maybe Coach went there to resupply. Off we go.
en.QuestLoc_TheresnoCryinginBaseball_QuestO: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_ThrowMeSomePepper_Conversation_: That nut wearing the Baseball Jersey? Aint seen him! Now beat it.
What? Vault Dwellers? Ugh. I HATE Vault Dwellers!
You come here to die, is that it?!
We came to kill Raiders and eat Cram. And we're all out of Cram!
We're looking for a guy named Coach. You seen him?
We're not Vault Dwelers! We killed them, and stole their suits!
That's it! We've had enough of you... you... Bad guys!!
en.QuestLoc_ThrowMeSomePepper_QuestLongDesc: Some Raiders have taken over an old apartment complex. Maybe these jerks know the big jerk, Coach. Can't hurt to ask!
en.QuestLoc_ThrowMeSomePepper_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_TimeforaGrandSlam_Conversation_: Still no Jersey! The Wasteland sure is a cruel mistress!
en.QuestLoc_TimeforaGrandSlam_QuestLongDesc: Our next stop is an old Chryslus Rocket '69 plant. It's as good a place to look as any.
en.QuestLoc_TimeforaGrandSlam_QuestObjectiv: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_TooGoodtobeTrue_Conversation_1_: We made it! Let's grab everything we can.
en.QuestLoc_TooGoodtobeTrue_QuestLongDescri: That abandoned Vault stocked with supplies? That's Deathclaw territory now. How he got in there, nobody knows, but you won't get to the stash without facing him first. Time to break out the big guns!
en.QuestLoc_TooGoodtobeTrue_QuestObjective_: Claim the supply stash in the abandoned Vault.
en.QuestLoc_TooGoodtobeTrue_QuestShortDescr: Claim a stash of supplies... if you can get past the Deathclaw that's guarding them!
en.QuestLoc_ToySoldiers_Conversation_1_NPCE: The survivors ran off to Poseidon Energy's Offices. Too bad you won't be so lucky!
en.QuestLoc_ToySoldiers_Conversation_1_NPCS: Look! More stupid soldiers trying to get themselves killed!
en.QuestLoc_ToySoldiers_Conversation_1_Team: You mean the Roughnecks? Where did they go?
en.QuestLoc_ToySoldiers_QuestLongDescriptio: A Dweller told me that Maxson's Roughnecks made their way to the Wilson Atomatoys Factory. That should be my next stop.
en.QuestLoc_ToySoldiers_QuestShortDescripti: Look for Maxson's Roughnecks at the Wilson Atomatoys Factory.
en.QuestLoc_TruthAmongtheAshes_Conversation: Aha! It's the journal of Overseer Patel! Hmm. What's this passage...
Had an interesting visitor - Paula Plumbkin. Weird name. Nice lady.
She headed out to visit Vault 909, but I told her it had been overrun.
She didn't care. Something about an epic Quest. Alrighty then.
en.QuestLoc_TruthAmongtheAshes_QuestLongDes: Vault 333 has been ransacked, but maybe there's a clue to Paula Plumbkin's whereabouts!
en.QuestLoc_TruthAmongtheAshes_QuestShortDe: Search Vault 333 for a clue to Paula Plumbkin's whereabouts.
en.QuestLoc_UninvitedGuests_Conversation_1_: It's called dinner, and guess who just got added to the menu!
I guess we can always add “Dweller” to the menu!
This is a private dinner party!
en.QuestLoc_UninvitedGuests_QuestLongDescri: You can across a small cabin out in the Wasteland. Time to investigate!
en.QuestLoc_UninvitedGuests_QuestShortDescr: You've discovered an old Cabin out in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_Vault199_Conversation_1_NPCEnd_: No dogs here. Try our sister Vault: 899. They're classier. But first, take this as as our token of thanks.
en.QuestLoc_Vault199_Conversation_1_NPCStar: You got here just in time! We weren't expecting that last minute... infestation.
Some people say 199 is pretty cheap when it comes to Vaults, but we love her all the same.
It's easy when you've nowhere else to go!
en.QuestLoc_Vault199_Conversation_1_Team_1: Has a dog named Bigsby stopped by here?
en.QuestLoc_Vault199_QuestLongDescription: The Raiders mentioned Bigsby may have fled to Vault 199. I should go ask around. Hopefully, the Dwellers have him.
en.QuestLoc_VaultopolisAwaits_Conversation_: Many seek our sanctuary. Few find it. For we are... utopia.
You are from a Vault, no? May yours grow to be as amazing as ours.
You are welcome here always. Take these gifts, and our friendship.
en.QuestLoc_VaultopolisAwaits_QuestLongDesc: Paula Plumbkin turned out to be an evil Raider wannabe, but at least she gave us the location of Vault 525, otherwise known as Vaultopolis!
en.QuestLoc_VaultopolisAwaits_QuestShortDes: Vaultopolis is in the Shaded Valley - time to complete our Quest!
en.QuestLoc_WastelandDoctoring_Conversation: You've saved this settlement. Here. You deserve everything we can afford to give!
Thank you! Here. It's everything we have.
You Vault Dwellers are amazing! Thank you!
I managed to drag all the sick and wounded here. Can you help us?
Don't worry. We'll patch you all up.
You owe us big time, but I guess we'll help.
Speedy medical service! Curtesy of your friendly neighborhood Vault!
en.QuestLoc_WastelandDoctoring_QuestLongDes: We've picked up a radio transmission. A nearby settlement has sick and wounded in need of help!
en.QuestLoc_WastelandDoctoring_QuestShortDe: Bring medical aid to a nearby settlement.
en.QuestLoc_WastelandGetaway_QuestLongDescr: You came across a small secluded cabin while adventuring in the Wasteland. Perhaps you should see what's inside.
en.QuestLoc_WastelandGetaway_QuestShortDesc: You found a secluded Cabin in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_WeaponsRun_QuestLongDescription: You've gotten a lead to a supply of Weapons out in the Wasteland.
en.QuestLoc_WeaponsRun_QuestObjective_1: Recover the main stash of Weapons.
en.QuestLoc_WelcometoParadise_QuestLongDesc: I've discovered a map leading to Vault 242, where the “Dwellers” were all creatures rather than humans. I should follow the map and unlock the secrets this Vault has to offer.
en.QuestLoc_WereBatting1000_QuestLongDescri: Coach is out there. Somewhere. Watching. Taunting. When we find him, we find Rackie Jobinson's Jersey!
en.QuestLoc_WereBatting1000_QuestObjective_: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_WhackaMole_QuestLongDescription: Now Big Wes wants you to kill a Mole rat Brood Mother, with one catch. You can only use pistols. Good luck piercing moleskin with those!
en.QuestLoc_WhackaMole_QuestObjective_1: Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother.
en.QuestLoc_WhackaMole_QuestShortDescriptio: Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother.
en.QuestLoc_WhatsonSecond_Conversation_1_NP: Another room, another failure. But we won't give up hope!
en.QuestLoc_WhatsonSecond_QuestLongDescript: Thirteen searches, thirteen failures. How unlucky! For the fourteenth attempt, we'll search the ruins of Vault 701.
en.QuestLoc_WhatsonSecond_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_WhenLifeThrowsYouaCurveball_Que: Coach wasn't at the Wilson Automatoys factory, but maybe he's getting in a workout in the ruins of Madden's Gym!
When Life Throw's You a Curveball...
Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_WhenPrestonCalls_Conversation_1: Said there were some settlers that had been kidnapped by Raiders. They're in Vault 778. Here, take this uniform. I sure won't need it.
You're a lot more effective than that last fellow.
He tried to recruit us into the Minutemen or whatever, then took off.
Did he say where he was going?
en.QuestLoc_WhenPrestonCalls_QuestLongDescr: A group of settlers is stuck in a Mole rat den. Word is, they have info on Preston Garvey. Go help them out of their jam!
en.QuestLoc_WhenPrestonCalls_QuestObjective: Kill the Mole rat Brood Mother.
en.QuestLoc_WhenPrestonCalls_QuestShortDesc: Get more information to find Preston.
en.QuestLoc_WhosonFirst_Conversation_1_NPCS: No Coach. No Jersey. No nothing.
en.QuestLoc_WhosonFirst_QuestLongDescriptio: Henrietta was Coach's old girlfriend. She doesn't know where he is, but gave us a sweet weapon to help take him down. The search goes on!
en.QuestLoc_WhosonFirst_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestLoc_WithFriendsLikeThese_Conversati: That Willard Glover guy was out of his mind.
He thought the Mole rats were his friends.
Just when I thought Raiders couldn't get any crazier...
en.QuestLoc_WithFriendsLikeThese_QuestLongD: I've found a ransom note written by a Raider Boss named Willard Glover. He says he's captured a settler and taken him to the nearby Corvega Factory.
en.QuestLoc_WithFriendsLikeThese_QuestShort: Rescue the settler trapped in the Corvega Factory.
en.QuestLoc_WithFriendsLikeThese_RaiderLine: You killed my furry little friends! How could you!?
en.QuestLoc_WondersofNature_Conversation_1_: Ah, hello there! I am Dr. Hurfburg. Do you like my disguise?
I have seen things... Horrors which no man should see.
The pincers, and the eggs... Gah!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofNature_QuestLongDescri: Famed scientist Otto von Hurfburg is nearby, researching the mating habits of Radscorpions. Make sure he's not in over his head.
en.QuestLoc_WondersofNature_QuestShortDescr: Dr. Hurfburg vs. Pincers of Peril!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofScience_Conversation_1: Ah, hello there! I am Dr. Hurfburg. Do you like my disguise?
For years, I have searched for something to prolong life, always without results.
But now, I have found the secret!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofScience_QuestLongDescr: Famed scientist Otto von Hurfburg is nearby, searching for a modern-day Fountain of Youth. Find him, and learn what he's discovered!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofScience_QuestShortDesc: Dr. Hurfburg is on a Quest for knowledge and adventure!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofTechnology_Conversatio: Ah, hello there! I am Dr. Hurfburg. Do you like my disguise?
This project has been a disaster! The robots do nothing but explode!
And all that noise has attracted some very unsavory creatures!
Here, please take these leftover parts. They're of no use to me!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofTechnology_QuestLongDe: Famed scientist Otto von Hurfburg is nearby, working on a Mr. Handy capable of exploring space. See what he's discovered!
en.QuestLoc_WondersofTechnology_QuestShortD: Dr. Hurfburg is on a Quest for knowledge and adventure!
en.QuestLoc_WorstCoachEver_Conversation_1_N: There's something spray painted on the wall!
It must be Coach! Mocking us!
en.QuestLoc_WorstCoachEver_QuestLongDescrip: No luck in the pencil factory, but we're not discouraged. Rackie Jobinson's Jersey will be ours! We'll search the old Hubris Comics store.
en.QuestLoc_WorstCoachEver_QuestObjective_1: Search for Rackie Jobinson's Baseball Jersey.
en.QuestObjective_ClearOut: Kill all Enemies in the Secret Room
en.QuestSurprise_Discovered_MarketPlace: [0] has discovered a Super Duper Mart.
en.QuestSurprise_Discovered_RedRocket: [0] has discovered a Red Rocket Truck Stop.
en.QuestSurprise_Enter_Female: Do you want her to go in?
en.QuestSurprise_Enter_Male: Do you want him to go in?
en.Quest_Dialog_1_1: What do we have here? Vault Dwellers?
en.Quest_Dialog_1_2: You must be looking for the Boss.
en.Quest_Dialog_1_3: We've got no love for him.
en.Quest_Dialog_1_4: Leave us be and we'll tell you where he is.
en.Radio_Upgrade_Info: Increases chances to call a Dweller from the Wasteland
en.RecipeLoot_Raiders: A Raider had a Recipe on them!
en.RecipeLoot_Wasteland: A Dweller found a Recipe in the Wasteland!
en.Resources_Not_Collected: THE DWELLER'S ITEMS MUST BE COLLECTED FIRST
en.Room_Armory_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR PERCEPTION
en.Room_Bar_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR CHARISMA
en.Room_BarberShop_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO CUSTOMIZE THEM
en.Room_Cafeteria_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE FOOD
en.Room_Casino_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR LUCK
en.Room_ClassRoom_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR INTELLIGENCE
en.Room_DecorationFactory_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO CRAFT DECORATIONS
en.Room_Dojo_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR AGILITY
en.Room_Elevator_Desc: USED TO ACCESS LOWER FLOORS OF YOUR VAULT
en.Room_Energy2_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE POWER
en.Room_Geothermal_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE POWER
en.Room_Gym_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR STRENGTH
en.Room_HydroponicFarm_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE FOOD
en.Room_LivingQuarter_Desc: INCREASES THE NUMBER OF DWELLERS YOU CAN HAVE IT ALSO ALLOWS YOU TO BREED NEW DWELLERS
en.Room_Mausoleum_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TAKE CARE OF THE DECEASED AND EARN CAPS
en.Room_MedBay_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE STIMPAKS
en.Room_NukaColaPlant_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE NUKA-COLA!
en.Room_OutfitFactory_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO CRAFT OUTFITS
en.Room_Overseer_Desc: SEND DWELLERS ON QUESTS FROM HERE
en.Room_Overseer_Upgrade_Level2: Send Dwellers out on 2 Quests at a time
en.Room_Overseer_Upgrade_Level3: Send Dwellers out on 3 Quests at a time
en.Room_Radio_Desc: ATTRACTS NEW DWELLERS FROM THE WASTELAND
en.Room_ScienceLab_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE RADAWAYS
en.Room_StorageArea_Desc: INCREASES THE NUMBER OF ITEMS AND PETS YOU CAN HOLD
en.Room_SuperRoom2_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO TRAIN THEIR ENDURANCE
en.Room_Upgrade_Not_Enough_Dwellers_Legenda: Upgrade the room to Level 3 to craft Legendary Outfits.
Upgrade the room to Level 3 to craft Legendary Weapons.
en.Room_Upgrade_Not_Enough_Dwellers_RareOut: Upgrade the room to Level 2 to craft Rare Outfits.
en.Room_Upgrade_Not_Enough_Dwellers_RareWea: Upgrade the room to Level 2 to craft Rare Weapons.
en.Room_Water2_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE WATER
en.Room_WaterProcessingPlant_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO PRODUCE WATER
en.Room_WeaponFactory_Desc: ASSIGN DWELLERS HERE TO CRAFT WEAPONS
en.Shop_Banner_Lunchboxes_2: Guaranteed one Rare Card or Better.
en.Shop_Banner_NukaQuantum_1: Speed things up with Nuka-Cola Quantum.
en.Shop_NukaCola_Line1: Use Nuka-Cola Quantum to speed up Wasteland travel and skip more Objectives per day.
en.Shop_PetBanner_Text2: Dwellers train to max level without stopping.
en.Shop_PetBanner_Text4: Chance of having twins or triplets.
en.Shop_StarterPack_Line1: Jumpstart your Vault with everything needed to get your underground life started quickly. Includes a Legendary Dweller, 2 Rare Dwellers, a Legendary Pet and a Mr. Handy. Plus Nuka-Cola Quantum and lots of Vault resources. Limit 1 per Vault.
en.Social_NoFriends: Invite your Facebook Friends to play Fallout Shelter so you can exchange Junk with each other.
en.Social_NoGifts: You have not received any Gifts.
en.Social_NoHelpRequests: You have not received any Gift requests.
en.Social_NoInternet: You must be connected to the internet to exchange Junk with your Friends.
en.Social_NotLogin: Connect to Facebook to exchange Junk with your Friends.
en.Speech_Birth_Incident: This is no time to start a family. There's an incident in the Vault!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic1: Up for a game of cards later?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic10: If you could visit one famous landmark in the outside world, what would it be?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic11: I've been reading about the creatures of the Wasteland! They sound frightening!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic12: We're safe here in the Vault... Right?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic13: Want to listen to the radio later?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic14: If you could have any type of person come into our Vault, who would it be?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic15: I'm writing a new song, praising the Overseer. I need a word that rhymes with “great.”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic17: If you could leave the Vault and go claim any kind of building for your home, what would it be?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic18: I want to draw you a picture later. Any requests?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic19: Hey, did you hear what they were talking about last night?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic2: What do you think would make the scariest mutated animal?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic20: Is it true what they're saying? About... you know who?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic21: If it were safe to leave the Vault, and live on the outside, would you ever want to?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic22: Hey, I just wanted to say... I really appreciate everything you do for the Vault.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic23: Wow. Heck of a day, huh?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic24: I think for dinner I'll have a big steak. What about you?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic25: Want to play a game later? Checkers or something?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic26: Is it drafty in here, or is it just me?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic27: Who do you think would win in a fight, a lumberjack with tentacle arms, or a shark riding a unicycle?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic28: I hear you've been doing great work lately.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic29: I was wondering - what's your favorite kind of pizza?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic3: How many other Vaults do you think are out there?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic32: I don't want to toot my own horn, but rumor has it I'll be the next Overseer.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic33: Okay, I don't like to spread rumors. But have you heard about... the thing?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic34: I need a screwdriver for my project. Do you have one?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic35: If we kept expanding down and struck lava, what would you do?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic37: I wish I could learn another language. What about you?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic38: Don't get too close. I think I'm coming down with something.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic4: I've been thinking about making a cake for everyone. What flavor would be best?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic40: I found a Vault Suit on the floor. What do you think it means?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic41: My birthday's coming up. What are you going to get me?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic42: If Raiders attack, can we count on you in a fight?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic47: I've been working out. Building up my bis, tris, quads, pecs.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic48: So, I've decided to write the great American novel. It's about all of us!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic49: You heard the one about the football coach and the waitress?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic5: Stay sharp! The Overseer's watching us!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic50: Have you read the book yet? For book club?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic52: Wow, I have the jitters! Too much caffeine!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic53: Ugh. I have this itch. I don't suppose you could... you know.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic54: Can you help with my crossword? Five-letter word, ends with “t.” - “Often terrible, always uncomfortable.”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic55: Need help with this crossword. Nine letters. Starts with “c” and ends with “d.” Means, “A horror you can never escape.”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic56: Got this song stuck in my head. “Baby, yeah, babbbbyyy! You can light my...”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic57: Is it night or day? I've lost track.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic58: Have you seen my best friend?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic59: What would win in a fight? A Radscorpion or a Yao Guai?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic6: I wish I had a pet. What about you?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic7: If I started a Vault baseball team, would you join?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic8: Can you help with my crossword? Six-letter word. “Lives in the Wasteland.”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC1_Topic9: I'm reading this great book. It's about this school teacher who falls in love with a mechanic.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic10_Respons: Hmm... Probably that giant ball of yarn. Always did want to see that.
Oh, the Eiffel Tower. Definitely. So romantic. Assuming, you know... it's still there.
The Great Wall of China. I bet it's still standing.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic11_Respons: I know! Flies the size of dogs! Scorpions the size of cows! Glad I'm not out there.
I've heard there are lots of animals with two heads. Apparently it's a theme.
I don't know. Some of them sound kind of cute. Like “Yao Guai” - how bad could that be?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic12_Respons: Of course we are! The Overseer would never let anything happen to us!
Safer than we'd be outside, that's for sure!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic13_Respons: Maybe. So long as you don't start dancing. It's kind of embarrassing.
Okay, but no sad songs! I need to stay positive.
Sure! Maybe we can pick up a frequency from someone on the outside...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic14_Respons: Probably a renowned Swiss chocolatier. What? I like chocolate.
A great comedian! I mean, no offense, but your jokes kind of stink.
A famous author. They could write my biography: “Dweller: A Profile in Awesomeness.”
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic16_Respons: Nobody's home. See what I did there?
No. NO. Please, no “knock knock” jokes...
Aggh! Somebody's knocking on the Vault door! It's a Raider! He'll kill us all!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic17_Respons: A castle. With a moat, and battlements, and a drawbridge. Oh, and dragons. Got to have dragons.
Another Vault, all to myself, where nobody can ask me stupid questions.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic18_Respons: No thanks. I've seen your drawings...
Aw, that's so sweet of you. How about a lighthouse?
A drawing of the Overseer. Now THAT would be something...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic19_Respons: I know! I can't believe she did that! The nerve of some people.
Oh, you mean that, er... situation? With the thing? Oh, I heard all right.
I didn't, no. But that's okay. Unlike some people, I don't like to spread gossip...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic1_Response: Hmm. Maybe. But only if I can deal.
Sure. Poker. We'll play for Caps.
No thanks. I'm going to play solitaire instead.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic20_Respons: Sure is. And he seemed like such a nice guy.
I really hope not. I hate the idea of living in the same Vault with a person like that.
What? No! Of course it isn't true! Really, you can't believe everything you hear...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic21_Respons: Nope. Never. I love living in the Vault. This is my home... and always will be.
Well, maybe. But it depends on what they have out there. Carnivals? Street car races? Cotton candy? I mean, it would have to be worth it.
Ha! Like it will ever be safe out there...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic22_Respons: Oh my goodness! Thank you so much. I appreciate everything you do, too.
Oh. Well. Um... Isn't that... sweet?
Finally, somebody recognizes how invaluable I am!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic23_Respons: Tell me about it. Life in the Vault, huh?
Right? But I wouldn't trade it for anything.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic24_Respons: Probably just something quick. Maybe a bowl of Sugar Bombs.
Oh, I could eat Fancy Lads Snack Cakes for any meal. In fact, I usually do.
Same thing I have for dinner every night - a can of Pork 'n Beans and an ice cold Nuka-Cola.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic25_Respons: Checkers? What are we, ten years old? We'll play chess.
Oh, maybe. I'll check my duty schedule and get back to you.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic26_Respons: You know, I think it is. Someone needs to check the seals on the Vault door.
The environmental controls may be on the fritz again. Can't say I'm surprised.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic27_Respons: Depends. What color is the unicycle?
Hmmm. I mean, it's hard to beat a shark. But lumberjacks are really tough. I just can't decide.
Why do they have to fight? Why can't they just be friends and go grab coffee?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic28_Respons: Really? That's so great to hear. Thank you!
From who? The Overseer? Has the Overseer been talking about me?!
Oh, you know, I just do the best I can. If it helps the Vault, it helps us all.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic29_Respons: Why the classic, of course - pepperoni.
I prefer a Hawaiian Mongolian Neapolitan blend. But no anchovies.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic2_Response: Oh, that's easy. A hippo. Definitely a hippo.
Hmmm... Maybe a monkey. Those things are creepy.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic30_Respons: I never learned how to catch. But you should see me throw!
Not really. But you want to kick the soccer ball around instead?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic32_Respons: The day that happens is the day I wander into the Wasteland.
Really? I think you'd make a great Overseer!
Fine by me. I'll blindly follow anyone with a title and authority.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic33_Respons: Yes! The others told me! It sounds so... dangerous!
Well, I have, but I don't believe it.
No, I haven't. Is it anything like... the whatchamacallit?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic34_Respons: I have a hammer. Same thing.
Phillips, flat, square, Frearson, Pozidriv or JIS?
Sure do. You can borrow it for 200 Caps.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic35_Respons: Hmmm? Probably weaponize it. To fight the Mole Men.
Well, I'd burn to death, I'm guessing.
Oh, that's easy. I'd be a new thermogenerator. Because... POWER!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic36_Respons: Who's there? Wait. You know what? Never mind. I don't care.
Oh my God! Raiders at the Vault Door! Raiders at the Vault Door!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic37_Respons: Nah. I can barely speak this one.
I'd love to learn binary code, so I can bargain for my life when the robots enslave us all.
Ah, but I am already fluent in the language... of love.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic38_Respons: Don't worry. That was never on my agenda.
Yeah, looks like you're coming down with an acute case of hypochondria.
Oooh, what is it? Black Death? Typhus? Super Ebola? The Blue Flu?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic39_Respons: My goodness! Who could have done such a thing! *burp*
Wow. That is... quite a predicament. I'm sure the Overseer will see to this personally. Really.
That's terrible! You just don't mess with a person's sweetroll...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic3_Response: Other Vaults? There are other Vaults?
You know, I've never thought about it. Our Vault is so amazing, why would I?
I bet... two others. Maybe three. Or five hundred.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic40_Respons: That you live with a bunch of slobs?
Isn't it obvious? Someone's been disintegrated!
It can only mean one thing – nudie party!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic41_Respons: A dictionary, so you can look up the definition of “selfish.”
Hand-knitted socks, of course. They're my specialty.
A one-way ticket to the Wasteland.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic42_Respons: You know it! I'll gladly lay down my life for this Vault!
Yeeeeaahhh... See, I'm more of a “lover not a fighter” type.
Absolutely. I'll be there right next to you. Well, maybe behind you...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic43_Respons: Oh, it's... fine. Not good. Not bad. You know. Just sort of... meh.
Wait... do you really want to know? Or is that just your way of saying “Hi”?
How's it going, you ask? Why it's going fantastic! *Play along – the Overseer might be listening.*
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic44_Respons: Oh, you know. A ceiling made of steel. With a copious amount of asbestos, by the looks of it.
Not much! Just happy that I'm here in the Vault, and not out in the Wasteland! You know... dying.
Well, I'm busy. What about you? Don't YOU have somewhere else to be? Hint hint.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic45_Respons: Always great to see you. Really.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic46_Respons: Busy as a bee tucked away in a subterranean steel honeycomb!
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic47_Respons: Wow, yeah! I can totally tell! Lookin' good!
Really? I never would have known.
Might want to tighten up those glutes.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic48_Respons: Oooh! Am I one of the main characters? I bet I am. I mean, how could I not be?
Just change my name, okay? I value what little privacy I have down here.
You? Write a novel? Have you maybe considered... a coloring book instead?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic49_Respons: I have! And the waitress says, “Keep the change? But I'm wearing denim!” Ha ha ha ha! Love that one...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic4_Response: Triple-layer vanilla walnut. With a coconut fondant.
Raisinberry! Wait... is that even a real fruit?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic50_Respons: Yep, sure have. I can't believe she died at the end. From chicken pox. So sad.
Oh, darn. Was that this week? I totally forgot.
No. I keep telling you I only read Grognak.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic51_Respons: Nope. Nothing. But you may have a sinus infection.
Just the usual. Sweat, oil, steel, moldy bread and loneliness.
Yes, actually. I noticed it just as you walked up...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic52_Respons: Me too! I should probably stop spiking my Nuka-Cola with espresso...
That's the spirit! Decaf is for the weak.
Ssshh. Don't let the Overseer hear. You'll get assigned a double shift.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic53_Respons: Touch you? I... I mean... scratch your... body?
Of course! Always happy to help a friend in need.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic54_Respons: Sorry, I'm more of a math person.
That's easy. Bigot. No, wait – Theft! Yeast?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic57_Respons: I lost track. Does it really matter?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic58_Respons: Hmm? Oh, yeah, I think he's down there.
But... But... I thought I was your best friend...
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic59_Respons: Hmmm... Scorpion against bear... Gotta go bear.
You're kidding, right? Radscorpion. All the way.
Who cares? Super Mutant Behemoth vs. Deathclaw. Now that's a REAL fight.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic5_Response: What? You mean now? RIGHT now?
I know! It's a little creepy, isn't it?
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic6_Response: Nah. But a robot servant would be pretty great.
You know, I always wanted a dog.
I'd love a chameleon. But I bet the radiation would make it all... weird.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic7_Response: Sure. But only if I get to play first base. That's where all the action is.
Nah. I'm more of a croquet person myself.
Baseball? Inside the Vault? Good luck with that.
en.Speech_Conversation_NPC2_Topic9_Response: Oh! I read that one. She dies at the end. It's really sad.
I read that, too. Seven times. We really need more books...
“Rulers and Wrenches”? Yeah, that's a good one.
en.Speech_Eviction_1: My death is on your conscience!
en.Speech_Eviction_10: You're going to regret this. You'll see.
en.Speech_Eviction_12: Wait. Wait wait wait. One sec, okay? There has to be a mistake!
en.Speech_Eviction_15: You'll rue the day you banished me! Rue the day!
en.Speech_Eviction_16: But I can still come visit, right? Right?
en.Speech_Eviction_17: This is ridiculous. Do you have any idea how important I am?!
en.Speech_Eviction_18: Wait ‘till the Overseer hears about this. Heads are going to roll!
en.Speech_Eviction_2: After I conquer the Wasteland, I'm going to come back and conquer you!
en.Speech_Eviction_23: Well, it was nice while it lasted.
en.Speech_Eviction_24: At least now I'll be able to own my own home.
en.Speech_Eviction_25: Overseer! Overseer, help! They're kicking me out!
en.Speech_Eviction_27: You guys are doing me a favor. I was getting too soft in the Vault.
en.Speech_Eviction_28: But I can still come back and visit. Right?
en.Speech_Eviction_29: Let's get one thing straight - you're not evicting me! I'm leaving of my own free will!
en.Speech_Eviction_3: It's been real, it's been nice, but it hasn't been real nice.
en.Speech_Eviction_30: If there was a problem, you could have mentioned that BEFORE KICKING ME OUT!
en.Speech_Eviction_4: So you're really doing it. Kicking me out. Not cool...
en.Speech_Eviction_6: Whatever. I outgrew this Vault a long time ago anyway.
en.Speech_Eviction_7: You're going to miss me more than I miss you!
en.Speech_Eviction_9: I was planning on leaving anyway. So there.
en.Speech_FlavorText_LQ_01: Think I'll just relax for a bit.
en.Speech_FlavorText_LQ_03: Good to have some time to myself.
en.Speech_FlavorText_LQ_04: If only I had the right kind of company...
en.Speech_FlavorText_LQ_05: It's not much... but it's home.
en.Speech_FlavorText_ProductionRoom_03: No problems. Just the way I like it.
en.Speech_FlavorText_ProductionRoom_04: We seem to be running at peak efficiency.
en.Speech_FlavorText_ServiceRoom_03: Maybe I should take a walk outside. What's the worst that could happen?
en.Speech_FlavorText_ServiceRoom_04: The Vault is kind of like a house, I guess. A big, metal, subterranean house.
en.Speech_FlavorText_ServiceRoom_05: I'm kind of bored. I guess I should be thankful.
en.Speech_FlavorText_TrainingRoom_01: Nothing like working up a sweat!
en.Speech_FlavorText_TrainingRoom_03: Time to get the blood pumping!
en.Speech_FlavorText_TrainingRoom_04: Feel like I could take on the Commies bared handed!
en.Speech_FlavorText_TrainingRoom_05: Cardio, weights, calisthenics I can do it all!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller1: Just another great day in the Vault.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller10: Could things get any better? Probably not.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller11: Thinking of starting a Vault baseball team...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller12: Anybody want to do a puzzle later?
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller16: How does that joke go again? A man and a rabbit walk into a bar...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller17: I've got this song stuck in my head. La la, di di do do...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller18: Oooh. I think I feel a bathroom break coming on.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller19: I feel like I've been on my feet forever...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller2: Glad I'm in here and not out there...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller20: Wonder if there's enough room to play football in the Vault...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller21: Maybe I'll read a good book later. One of the classics.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller22: Hmm... Maybe we should all paint the Vault a different color.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller23: Huh. Thought I heard a humming in the ventilation system.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller24: Was that... skittering? Darned Radroaches could be right under us.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller25: Nothing like feeling safe and secure.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller26: If we keep expanding, we may reach China!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller27: I'm tired of Cram. We really need a taco night.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller28: I could really go with a nice, relaxing bath.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller29: Brrr... There's a draft coming from somewhere.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller30: I wonder what the future will bring...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller31: Why blue? I mean, would a yellow jumpsuit really be THAT bad?
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller32: What's that smell? Is... EW. Plumbing must be backed up again.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller33: I bet the Overseer is like Santa Claus. Fat, magical, and always watching.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller34: I'm just full of vim and vigor!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller35: Our Vault feels just like a robot's womb! If robots... had mothers...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller36: Someday, maybe my grandkids will live here!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller37: Can you milk a Brahmin? ‘Cause that would mean... ICE CREAM!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller38: Ahhh, my aching back. We really need a Vault masseuse.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller39: Everybody doing okay? Of course we are!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller4: Maybe the Overseer will send me out exploring soon...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller40: We working hard, or hardly working? He he he he.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller41: The lack of sun is getting to me. Time to up my vitamin D dosage.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller42: I don't care if the oceans are irradiated. I'd kill for some fish and chips.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller43: Hey hey hey, what do you say?
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller44: Time for a coffee break yet?
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller45: Nuka-Cola this, Nuka-Cola that. I want some root beer.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller46: I need to look into Vault-Tec's retirement plan...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller47: If more bombs fell, would we even know it? Probably not.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller48: Come on, everyone! The Overseer's counting on us!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller49: I'm so happy today! I love the Vault! And my anti-depressants!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller5: I think we should throw a party. Everybody loves parties!
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller50: I admit, I've never seen another Vault, but ours MUST be the best.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller51: I heard there are Vaults all over the country. But that's crazy talk.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller52: Is it true there are Vaults all across the world? Naaahhh.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller53: I wonder how high the Vault numbers go...
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller54: I'm special, gosh darn it. And someday, the Overseer WILL notice me.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller56: I wonder how a Vault Suit would look with cowboy boots.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller57: One thing they never tell you – are you supposed to wear underwear under the jumpsuit or not?
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller58: I don't care what everyone says. Getting my pilot's license is NOT a crazy pipe dream.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller59: Wait, is this my free time or my work time? I can't keep track anymore.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller60: I wonder if anyone wants to go to the Living Quarters with me and... dance.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller7: I'd whistle a tune right now... if I knew how.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller8: I wonder what day it is. Not that it matters.
en.Speech_Generic_Dweller9: I've got one goal in life - to make this Vault perfect!
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy10: I really hope everyone else is as happy as I am.
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy11: Could I get any happier? Nope.
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy12: Another wonderful day in the Vault!
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy14: If joy is a state of mind, then my state of mind is great!
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy15: I'm just so happy I could burst! But don't worry... I won't.
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy2: Looks like I turned my frown upside down permanently!
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy5: Not a care in the world!
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy6: I feel a sense of... bliss.
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy7: I'm so happy I could pinch myself.
en.Speech_Happiness_Happy8: Life just couldn't get any better.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent1: Children are the future of this Vault.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent10: One day my perfect kid will grow into a perfect adult!
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent11: I just love my kid so much...
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent12: Someday, my awesome kid will be an awesome worker!
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent13: Children are like chocolates! You can never have too many!
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent14: Having kids means keeping our Vault going... forever!
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent3: I'm not saying I have the best kid in the Vault, but... I totally do.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent4: Reproducing isn't just fun. It's our responsibility.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent5: Being a parent is such a big responsibility. Good thing I'm great at it!
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent6: It's so comforting to know my child will grow up here in the Vault.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent7: My child is so perfect, I feel sorry for every other parent in here.
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent8: Could my child BE more wonderful?
en.Speech_Happiness_Parent9: Where's that child of mine? Bringing joy to the whole Vault, I'm sure!
en.Speech_HealthA2: I really need a breath of fresh air. Oh wait.
en.Speech_HealthA3: I could really use some rest.
en.Speech_HealthA5: I think I'm coming down with something.
en.Speech_HealthA6: I need to take better care of myself...
en.Speech_HealthB4: I think I need to lie down... for an hour or three...
en.Speech_HealthC3: I need a doctor! This is an emergency!
en.Speech_Kid1: I wish more kids lived here.
en.Speech_Kid10: I wonder if anyone in the Wasteland still makes comics...
en.Speech_Kid11: When I grow up, I'm going to explore the Wasteland!
en.Speech_Kid12: Someday I'll take the G.O.A.T. test and get to work!
en.Speech_Kid13: Wish I was old enough to gamble in the casino.
en.Speech_Kid14: Who wants to play hide and seek?
en.Speech_Kid15: Sometimes I feel the Overseer... watching me.
en.Speech_Kid16: Wonder if the cafeteria has any cookies.
en.Speech_Kid17: The grown ups are always so busy!
en.Speech_Kid18: I wonder if I'll live in this Vault forever.
en.Speech_Kid19: Can you have a snowball fight during nuclear winter?
en.Speech_Kid20: When do I get a Pip-Boy?
en.Speech_Kid21: Wonder what the weather's like outside.
en.Speech_Kid23: I've read Grognak #1 thirty seven times!
en.Speech_Kid24: I wonder how many other Vaults are out there.
en.Speech_Kid25: Are there any kids out there in the Wasteland?
en.Speech_Kid26: My mom and dad are always so busy...
en.Speech_Kid28: Really wish I had a pet.
en.Speech_Kid29: Maybe someone can build me a robot.
en.Speech_Kid3: If I snuck outside, would anyone notice?
en.Speech_Kid30: I bet there are mutant hamsters out in the Wasteland.
en.Speech_Kid31: My parents have the best jobs ever!
en.Speech_Kid32: I want to have a sleepover tonight!
en.Speech_Kid33: The Vault is like a big, metal pillow fort!
en.Speech_Kid34: I bet I could make a sling shot. That would be so cool.
en.Speech_Kid35: The Vault really needs some new toys.
en.Speech_Kid36: This is the best Vault ever!
en.Speech_Kid38: My mom and dad really help keep this place running!
en.Speech_Kid4: I wonder what it's like out in the Wasteland.
en.Speech_Kid40: Anybody want to throw the ol' football around?
en.Speech_Kid41: Do they play sports in the Wasteland?
en.Speech_Kid43: Help, there's a mutant in the Vault! Just kidding!
en.Speech_Kid44: No school, no babysitter - this is the life!
en.Speech_Kid46: I hope we have donuts for breakfast tomorrow.
en.Speech_Kid47: I wish I had a chemistry set.
en.Speech_Kid6: I could drink Nuka-Cola all day long.
en.Speech_Kid7: Maybe someone can find me some baseball cards.
en.Speech_Kid8: I wish we had TV in here.
en.Speech_Kid9: Sure wish I had a BB gun...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_1: I was thinking of hanging up some paintings.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_11: It's so good to have some free time to talk.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_12: Think we'll ever get to live outside the Vault?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_13: I wish we had some plants in here.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_14: I'm too lazy to go to the Cardio Room. I wish we had a treadmill in here.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_15: I need to remember to stock the fridge with Nuka-Cola.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_16: My feet are killing me. I should probably sit down.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_17: I really wish we had a Mr. Handy.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_18: Have you ever actually seen the Overseer?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_19: If I started a Knitting League, think anyone would sign up?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_2: Think I should paint the room?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_20: I wish I had a yoga mat in here.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_3: You think that camera sees... everything?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_4: I think the room needs a rug. Maybe there's one in storage.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_6: I think that steam is making me lightheaded.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_7: Sometimes, I imagine this room is actually a giant mansion, on 50 acres.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_8: The sofa needs repairs. I keep sinking into the cushions.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC1_9: If we lived outside, I'd have servants.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_1: Oh, good idea. Maybe cats. Or ships. Or cats on ships.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_11: Actually, I just want to relax, so... Ssssshhhh.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_12: Maybe. But why would you want to?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_13: Maybe Hydroponics can grow some gardenias.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_14: You... do see the irony in that statement. Don't you?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_16: Just please don't take off your shoes.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_17: Yeah, but a Mr. Gutsy would be way more fun.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_18: No, but I do always get the sense that someone's watching me...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_2: Maybe. But no yellow. I hate yellow.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_4: Good idea. My feet get so cold in the morning.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_6: You're imagining things. Then again, maybe that's because of the steam.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_7: Sometimes I imagine I'm not living with a crazy person.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_8: Maybe there's a new one in the Wasteland. Well, not a new one...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Dialogue_NPC2_9: If you lived outside, you'd be dead.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_Family1: Nothing like hanging out at home with my family.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_NoSpaceLQ: The Vault is too crowded to have any more babies.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_10: I don't know how I'd get by without you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_11: I think about you all the time!
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_12: You're the loveliest person I know.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_13: If roses still grew, I'd search the Wasteland to get you some.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_14: I really think we could have a future together.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_15: We make such a cute couple.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_16: You're the apple of my eye.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_17: What would I do without you?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_19: You make me feel like dancing.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_2: I'm glad we got some time together.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_20: If I could sing, I'd totally write a song about you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_21: I get butterflies whenever we're together.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_22: I'd be so lonely here without you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_24: I find myself completely drawn to you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_25: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put U and I together.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_26: I'm not a photographer, but I can picture you and me together.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_27: Do you have a map? I'm getting lost in your eyes.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_28: If I seem drunk, it's only because you're so intoxicating.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_29: Are we in a vertibird? 'Cause my heart's taking off.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_30: If I were a cat, I'd want to spend all 9 lives with you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_31: Is there a thief in the Vault? 'Cause you stole my heart.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_32: You must be a genie, because you're making my dreams come true.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_33: If love was radiation, I'd need a box of RadAways.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_34: Seriously, could you get any cuter?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_35: You're like cholesterol, always messin' with my heart.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_36: Did your father sell diamonds? 'Cause you are flawless.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_37: I really want to kiss you right now.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_38: You think maybe... I could call you baby?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_39: Being here with you makes me feel so... special.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_40: It is getting warm in here, or is it just me?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_41: I must have died in that last Radroach attack, 'cause baby? I'm in Heaven.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_42: Sound the alarm! We've got a thief in the Vault! They stole my heart. Heh.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_43: If I could rearrange the alphabet, I'd put B and O together. No! Wait! That's not right...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_44: Call the doctor! I'm having an infarction! That's a heart attack. Because you're so... Oh, never mind.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_45: Nuka-Cola's got nothin' on you, sugar.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_46: Like an irradiated post-apocalyptic parasitic organism, you are under my skin.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_47: Are you a book in the Vault library? 'Cause I am checking you out.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_48: Come here often? I mean, we're all trapped down here, so I assume yes, but still...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_49: I'm a licensed Vault Suit inspector. I'm going to need to hug you VERY closely.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_5: I've been thinking of you all day.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_50: You have beautiful thighs. Eyes! I meant eyes! But your thighs are nice too...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_51: Your teeth are so shiny and beautiful. Like a skeleton that's been picked clean.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_52: Is there a Yao Guai in the Vault? He must be looking for you, honey.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_53: I want to love you like this is my last day on Earth. Because it probably is.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_54: Are you swooning, or is that the radiation poisoning?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_55: Is that a Raider setting off explosives or is my heart pounding?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_56: I think... I think I'm in like with you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_57: I could use a good kiss.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_58: You're like food poisoning - tying my stomach in knots.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_6: It's so great to see you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_60: I think Cupid just emptied his quiver...
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_61: Is that jumpsuit felt? Would you like it to be?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_62: Do you have a watch? I think it's snuggle time.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_63: Your lips. They're just so... smoochable.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_64: I saw the doctor. He said my body's deficient... in vitamin U.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_65: You're so sweet, I'm getting a toothache.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_66: I hope another bomb goes off. I'd duck and cover with you anytime.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_67: Are you this nice to all the Dwellers?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_68: I think we're having an earthquake, ‘cause I'm falling for you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_69: Can you get that for me? I dropped my jaw.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_7: I just love spending time with you.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_70: You're like a broken thermostat. I just can't turn you down.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_71: If kisses were snowflakes, well... you'd better get some boots, that's all I'm saying.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_72: Sometimes, late at night, I smell the sweat and steel... and know that you smell it too.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_73: Baby, who cares about the sun? I'm the only light you need.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_74: Sorry, I'm all out of raisins. But you can have a date.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_75: You're like a cute, chubby polar bear – always trying to break the ice.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_77: Call for you. It's Heaven, wondering if you're coming home.
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_78: So, what are you up to for the rest of your life?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_79: Is that love in the air, or is the oxygen circulator on the fritz again?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_PickupLines_80: Are you this nice to all the Dwellers?
en.Speech_LivingQuarter_VaultSpace1: We can't start a family. There's no more room in the Vault.
en.Speech_NoPower1: This room's useless unless we generate more power!
en.Speech_NoPower2: We've gone dark! We need more power!
en.Speech_NoPower3: There isn't enough power! We need more!
en.Speech_NoPower4: We can't use the room! There's not enough power!
en.Speech_NoPower5: Oh no! Blackout! The room's offline until we get more power!
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_1: By myself. Outside the Vault. Oh, this’ll end well.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_10: Really wish I had some help.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_12: I can do this by myself... Right?
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_3: It’s not the loneliness that gets ya. It’s the being alone.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_4: I swear, if I die alone, I’m going to be so mad…
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_5: Doing this is one thing. Doing it alone? Ugh.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_6: Sure wish I had some company.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_7: Goin’ it solo. Because apparently that's how I roll.
en.Speech_Quest_Alone_Dweller_9: So now I have to do this alone. Awesome.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_10: That chill… I think a ghost just passed through me.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_11: The Overseer had better appreciate this.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_12: Why did I agree to do this?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_14: I’m doing this for the experience, right?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_15: What I wouldn’t give for a hot bath…
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_18: I think I’ve had enough excitement for one day.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_19: Living out here doesn’t seem bad. It seems HORRIBLE.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_2: I left the Vault for this?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_20: Death everywhere. I need an anti-depressant.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_21: Where’s some hand sanitizer when you need it?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_22: I can’t wait to get out of here.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_23: Wow, “adventuring” sure does get old quick.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_25: Never thought I’d say this, but I miss the Vault.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_26: I’d really like to sleep in my own bed tonight…
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_27: Hey, a dead rat on the floor. How charming.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_28: I can feel the dirt and grime seeping into my skin…
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_29: I deserve hazard pay for this.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_3: Did I just step in… Oh, gross.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_30: I can't believe I’m not even getting paid for this.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_31: Smells bad, looks bad, sounds bad… IS bad.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_32: This place is a goldmine of bacteria.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_33: Eww. Got something on my shoe.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_34: I’m never going to wash this stink out of my clothes.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_36: The Wasteland Survival Guide never prepared me for THIS.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_37: The Vault must be Heaven, cause this place... Ya know.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_38: Must not give in to fear...
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_4: I was promised an adventure. Someone lied.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_40: They need to fire their interior decorator.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_42: How do people actually live out here?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_43: Thank goodness I actually have a Vault to go home to.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_44: This place is giving me irritable bowel syndrome.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_45: I love what they've done with the place.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_46: They really need a Mister Handy to tidy this place up.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_47: Would it kill them to dust every now and then?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_48: If I die here, I'm going to be so mad.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_49: And I thought it was depressing OUTSIDE.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_50: Really starting to hate this place...
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_51: Just have to remember, I'll be home in the Vault soon...
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_52: Why'd I ever agree to leave the Vault?
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_53: This isn't as bad as I imagined. It's worse.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_54: Wow, humans really did screw things up royally.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_6: Now I know why they call it a Wasteland.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_8: Okay. I’m about ready to go home now.
en.Speech_Quest_Generic_Dweller_Conversatio: I’m starting to think this was a mistake
This place gives me the creeps.
Yeah, me too. Stay alert.
You're paranoid. What could possibly go wrong?
Really? I kind of like it.
Give me a status report.
Operating at full efficiency! Sort of...
Um... I'm... In a weird place? With you?
EXCUSE me? Who elected you Overseer?
What are we doing here again?
Serving the Vault and the Overseer! Hooray!
Wait, what? I thought you knew?
If you don't know, we are in a LOT of trouble...
Do you think the Overseer appreciates us?
What? Are you serious? Of course!
I often wonder the same thing myself...
You DARE question the Overseer's intentions?!
You smell that?
Flowers? No wait? Chocolate?
Yeah. It's like... blood. And poo.
You want a friend who sniffs, get a dog.
You hear that?
I hear YOU. And I wish I didn't.
Screaming? Music? Someone screaming along to music?
Sorry. I hear at an entirely different frequency.
What do you think happens when you die?
We'll talk about it later. In Hell.
Well, your body rots. And someone takes your stuff.
Easy! You go to the great Vault in the sky!
Have you ever met the Overseer?
Ha! No one EVER meets the Overseer...
Sadly, no. I have not been deemed worthy!
Oh, of course. We sup together regularly.
I've got a bad feeling about this...
Really? I have a pretty good feeling about it!
Same here. We're in... the danger zone.
Nobody asked you about your feelings.
My body aches all over.
Mine too. Questing sure is strenuous.
I feel great! You need to hit the gym more.
I really don't want to think about your body right now.
So am I, so am I…
Did you hear that?
So tired...
Not me. I'm fueled by Nuka-Cola and Sugar Bombs.
You need a new bed. Have you considered memory foam?
I know what you mean. Walk, walk, walk...
I get this feeling sometimes. Like I'm being watched...
You are... By me.
They say the Overseer sees all, knows all...
I know what you mean. Creepy, right?
Do these adventuring clothes make me look fat?
No. The fat makes you look fat.
Oh stop! You're gorgeous!
Wow. That's not a loaded question at all.
Got any snacks?
I was just about to ask you the same thing.
I got, let's see... Nothing.
Hello! Vault Dweller. Not a vending machine...
Hey, you think I'm Overseer material?
If you have to seek validation from me, then obviously not.
Overseer? You? Ha ha ha ha ha ha.
Totally! You'll have my full support. If we get back alive.
You know the real trick to going on a Quest?
Proper stretching?
Um... Leaving the Vault?
Not getting distracted by over-talkative companions?
When we get back, what are you going to do first?
Probably take my allocated 2.5 minute shower.
Maybe talk to my special someone and, you know. Dance.
Request never to be assigned with you again.
I am SO not having fun.
Oh, come on. It's not that bad. Okay, it IS. But still.
Speak for yourself. I'm having a blast!
You're such a buzzkill.
What are you thinking about?
Huh? Thinking? Am I SUPPOSED to be thinking?
Oh, the usual: the difference between narwhals and unicorns.
I'm thinking I really wish you'd focus on the mission.
What do you think they're doing back in the Vault?
Oh, you know. Having fun. Staying safe. Being happy.
I try not to think about it. It's too depressing.
Nothing half as cool as this!
Yeah – sounded like it’s close.
Did you bring the sandwiches?
So what do you think of the Wasteland?
Kind of charming, right? In it's own horrible way.
It's a complete nightmare. Duh.
Not much to think about. 'Cause... Wasteland.
Ever feel like life is just an illusion?
Yeah! Like we're all just pawns in some game...
Would you please just focus on what we're doing?
That's... a really dumb thing to say.
Getting a little tired of questing...
Not me! This is awesome!
Don't worry, we'll be home soon!
And you're out here because...?
You said you were bringing them...
Sandwiches? I thought you said tacos.
Oh, so I'm your servant now?
How you doing? Holding up?
Yup! No worries!
Exhausted and generally terrified, but otherwise okay.
How do you THINK I'm doing?
Know any good jokes?
Nope.
I do, but they wouldn't be appropriate right now.
Sorry. I left my clown nose back in the Vault.
Any thoughts?
Two. No three. I'll tell you them later.
Not right now. Saving my brain energy.
Ssshh. More walk, less talk.
I'm scared.
It'll be okay! You can do this!
Me too. Because we're probably going to die.
Darn it, stay strong! We need you!
Think we'll make it back to the Vault?
Of course! We're just THAT awesome!
What? Didn't you get the memo? SUICIDE, MISSION.
Possible. But highly unlikely.
Weird place, huh?
Right??
Weird doesn't even begin the describe it...
Don't be a snob.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_11: Ooooh... Now what do we have here?
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_13: And it's not even my birthday...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_2: Just what I've been looking for
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_20: Just what I was looking for.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_22: I'll just add this to the pile...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_23: The Overseer's going to love this!
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_27: I'll take whatever I can find.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_31: And the Wasteland just keeps on giving...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_32: Can never have too much stuff...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_34: The things you find out here.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_35: Hope nobody minds if I grab this...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_37: Can't let this go to waste...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_39: To the victor go the spoils!
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_41: I'll take whatever I can get.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_42: Out here, you make use of EVERYTHING.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_44: We may need more storage rooms!
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_46: Some may call this junk. Me, I call them treasures.
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_47: Ain't no waste in the Wasteland!
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_48: Let's see what we've got here...
en.Speech_Quest_Loot_Dweller_51: Go on Quest. Find treasure. Repeat.
en.Speech_Quest_MainPath_Dweller_2: Yeah, this is the right way.
en.Speech_Quest_MainPath_Dweller_3: On the right path. I can feel it.
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_1: If we get out of this alive, the Nuka-Cola’s on me.
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_10: Come on, gang. Let's make the Overseer proud!
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_2: Comforting, isn’t it? Knowing we’ll die together.
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_4: Why are we out here again?
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_5: You as completely creeped out as I am?
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_7: Come on, we can do it! Right?
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_8: Good thing we've got each other...
en.Speech_Quest_NotAlone_Dweller_9: So glad I'm here with my pals!
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_10: Got a feeling this is the wrong way...
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_2: No… This doesn’t feel like the right way.
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_3: So easy to get turned around in here…
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_4: This can’t be the right way.
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_5: Pretty sure this isn’t the right way.
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_6: Nope. This can’t be the right way.
en.Speech_Quest_WrongPath_Dweller_9: Hmm. The way doesn't feel right.
en.Speech_RadiationA5: I think I'm going to throw up...
en.Speech_RadiationB2: Aggh! My fingernails are falling off!
en.Speech_RadiationB3: I could really use a RadAway!
en.Speech_RadiationB4: Is that a hand... growing out of my stomach?!
en.Speech_RadiationB5: Someone help! I don't want to become a Ghoul!
en.Speech_Radio_HighCharisma1: If there is someone out there, they'll sure be listening to me!
en.Speech_Radio_HighCharisma2: To all people out in the Wasteland: We are waiting for you!
en.Speech_Radio_LowCharisma1: I don't think anyone is listening.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller1: Oh, a corpse! Isn't that pleasant.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller2: Smells like something died in here... Oh.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller3: Can somebody please get this corpse out of here?
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller4: Working next to a dead body. Not great for my productivity...
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Agility: So it is possible to exercise too much...
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Armory: They're dead! Was it a weapons malfunction?
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Bar: What were they drinking? I'll have a double.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Cafeteria: That has GOT to be a health violation.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Casino: Well, you know what they say. You can't take it with you.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Classroom: That's one way to gain all the knowledge in the universe.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Endurance: Someone lacked endurance, am I right?
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Geothermal: Worked till they dropped. Such dedication!
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Gym: Must have been a heck of a workout.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_LivingQuarters: At least they passed away peacefully, at home.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Medbay: So much for the finest medical care Vault-Tec could provide.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Nukacola: Hey you! No slacking on the production line!
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Radio: Looks like I've got a eulogy to broadcast.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Sciencelab: I hope they at least donated their body to science.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Storage: I'd take care of the body myself, but the smell might be a bit much.
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_Water2: We've got a serious sanitation problem in here!
en.Speech_Room_DeadDweller_WaterPlant: Get that corpse out of here! It'll contaminate everything!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob10: So glad I got assigned here!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob11: This really is the perfect job for me.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob12: I have the perfect work assignment. Thanks, Overseer!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob13: This room is running at peak efficiency... thanks to me!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob14: If I weren't working here, production wouldn't be nearly so good.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob15: Every day's a good day when I'm on the job!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob16: With me working here, maximum efficiency is guaranteed!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob17: Don't worry you've got ME on the job.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob18: What a perfect work assignment for me...
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob19: Have I mentioned recently how much I love my job?
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob2: To think, I've finally found my dream job!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob3: The G.O.A.T. was right! This is the perfect job for me!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob5: Hope there's a chance for overtime!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob6: This place would fall apart without me.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob7: What can I say? I'm great at my job.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob8: I can't imagine doing anything else in the Vault.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob9: The Overseer really made a smart move assigning me here.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Agility: Nobody trains harder than I do. Nobody.
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Armory: I knew being a total gun nut would come in handy some day!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Bar: I could sling drinks all day!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Cafeteria: Preparing food is my lifelong dream!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Casino: Poker or blackjack - I'm the best dealer there is!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Classroom: That teacher of the year award is so close, I can feel it!
en.Speech_Room_LoveJob_Endurance: I'm the fittest person in this Vault. And always will be.
